137b3: cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ ded dang lhan cag
137b4: tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med de lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med pas/ bdag
137b5: 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur ro snyam ste sems/ khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas bud med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang chu lha dang ku be ra dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la
137b6: sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang nags tshal gyi lha dang lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang chos
137b7: 'thun pa pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/ 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi de yang de lha ni ma yin te/ gal te
137b8: gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur bar rigs so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum
138a1: gang zhe na/ pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang ma dus la bab cing bzla mtshan dang ldan pa dang dri za 'ongs pa ste/ gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur // des lha mnyes par byas kyang ba
138a2: yang ma byung bu mo yang mabyung nas de'i blo 'di lta bu dag skyes te/ mal bdag gis mun ma zhig blangs na/ rgyal ba yod par 'gyur lta srid dam snyam ste/ dam rigs mnyam pa las chung mthongs te/ da dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dag/
138a3: mgur spyod do// dertse zhing dga' la dga' mgur sprod pa las phyi zhig na bu chags par gyur nas/ de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas khyim thab la sman pa/ jo bo bdag la sras chags te bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas
138a4: pa las ni khye'ur 'byung bar des kyis dgyes pa bskyod du gsol zhes byas so/ / de yang dga' ches te ro stong ni bteg lag pa g.yas pa ni brgyad nas/ bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu ro mthong bar 'ong ngo // bdag gi ba rung
138a5: bar shog cig/ mi rung bar ma gyur cig/ bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog cig/ gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog cig/ nor skal la spyod par shog cig/ bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog cig/ bdag cag 'das te shi
138a6: ba'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mar yang rung nyung yang rung ste/ sbyin bdag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas/ de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon pa sngo bar shog cig/ ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do// /
138a7: denas des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzangs kyi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste/ grang ba'i che grang pa'i yo byad rnams dang tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang ha cang khab
138a8: ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang skur ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang lan tshwa che ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang mdar ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang / ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams dang kha ba dang sbyar ba
138b1: dang lan tshwa dang dang rab dang cha ba dang bskab med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing / do shal dang se mo ngos lus rnam par klubs te/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par chu ba bzhin du khri steng nas khri'i ste dang khri'u'i steng nas
138b2: khri'u'i steng du rga zhing 'og gis gzhi la me 'bab pa dang / des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so// de nas chung ma snga ma des de bkur zhing gces par byed pa mthong nas phrag dog skyes te bsams pa gal te 'di las bu
138b3: bcas par gyur na ni bdag la gnod pa byed par gyur gyis/ ci nas de'i thabs shig bya dgos snyam mo// 'do ba las yongs su bsten pa la ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ci yang med de/ mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba'i g.yangs sar kha ltas
138b4: pa des yid ston du bcug nas/ gang 'thungs pa tsam gyis nyon mongs ma de'i bu 'byil bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngal drug pa'i rtsi byin no// de nas chung ma phyi ma des nye du thams cad bsdus nas chung ma snga ma de zhal che la bkug ste/
138b5: khyod kyis bdag yid rton du bcug nas mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin te des bdag gi bu 'byil to zhes byas so// de nas chung ma snga ma des nye du rnams kyi nang du mna' bor te/ gal te bdag gis khyod la mngal drug pa'i rtsi byin par gyur na
138b6: bdag yi dgas mor gyur te/ bu byung ngo cog za bar shog cig ces so// 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu ji snyam du sems// tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo de yin te/ des sngon phrag dog byas pa des na yi dgas mor
138b7: skyes so/ / des brdzun byas te mna'abor ba'i bas kyi rnam par smin pa des nyin mo dang mtshan mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing za bar gyur to// 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu de bas na khyod kyis ngag gi nyes pa spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ ci nas yi dgas
138b8: mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'dam pa sbyin gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal bas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha'
139a1: rdzing dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gang po la sogs pa'i rton papa rdob khyab bam po bcu gnyis pa/ byis
139a2: bung zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon can po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang po brang 'khor gyim rnaMs dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin nam
139a3: dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi
139a4: 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan
139a5: thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe yangs pa can na grong khyer gyi 'obs shig gi nang na yi dgas zas su skyugs pa zab por ba za ba dang
139a6: snabs dang gcin gyis 'tsho ba nag dang khrag dang phyis za ba mi bzad pa rang bzhin gyis sdug pas lnga brgya gnas so/ / yang smras pa/ skyugs pa za zhing bor bza// dar snabs gcin gyis 'tsho ba dang // rnag khrig dang ni phyi sa za// mi bzang
139a7: rang bzhin sdug cing 'dug/ yangs pa can den bram ze zhig kyang 'jug ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rteche ning dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// tsa ni dag ya ga bung spyod pa las rdu ma larba
139a8: chags nas de'i lus dring bar gyur to/ / de nas bram ze des mtshan mkhan rnams bkug ste dris na/ de dag na re 'di ni ston khye'u 'drag pa de'i mthu yin no zhes zer ro// shog na de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu zung ste khye
139b1: mdog ngan zhing bltan mi sdug pa byad ngan pa lus mi gtsang bas bskos pa dring bzhig btsas so/ / de'i mchog tu mi sdug mod kyi byams pa'i dbang gis sbrel bas pa ma gnyis kyis gsos so// de mi gtsang ba'i gnas rnams 'ba'
139b2: zhig du dga' la phyag dar gyi phung po dang byis khung du skra 'bal zhing khar mi gtsang ba 'dug nas de'i ming byis khung phyis khung zhes bya bar gyur to/ / re shig na de phan tshun du 'khyam pa las 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas de 'di snyam
139b3: du sems te/ 'di de lta bu'i gnas rnams su dga' ba las na 'di ni gor ma chag par grub pa'i skyes bu zhig yin gyis bdag gis 'di rab tu dbyung ngo snyam mo// des de rab tu phyung nas gcer bur 'khyam ning 'dug pa legs pa byed
139b4: pa la yang gnas so/ / de nas de 'khyam zhing song ba las yangs pa can gyi 'obs kyi nang na yi dgas lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel pas grong khyer gyi 'o bas de'i nang du song nas
139b5: de dag dang lhan cig 'dus shing phrad de dga' bar gyur nas grogs por gyur to/ / phyis re shig na khye'u phyis khung don zhig la brel te yangs pa can du song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyang grong khyer gyi 'obs der byon nas/ yi dgas de dag
139b6: gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i
139b7: 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo / / mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag phongs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
139b8: khyed cis phongs yi dgas rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni skom lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag sor lnga las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun lnga pab ste/ des yi dgas lnga brgya po
140a1: de dag tshim par mdzad do/ / de nas de dag bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa'i chos
140a2: nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas yi dgas las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan
140a3: 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de dag gis mthong ngo / / de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag len te/ bzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni
140a4: bdag cag cha ma yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dod do snyam yo// de nas sngon yi dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub 'khor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus
140a5: do shal dang se mo des brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i tsha brtan lus gur dgum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sdig la sogs pas thugs pa de rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang padam
140a6: dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ khang pa rtsegs pa'i gnas thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
140a7: 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ye dgas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su bachud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par
140a8: 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu lnga brgyas 'jig tshegs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste// de dag gis bden pa mthong nas tshed pa kha
140b1: spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nang pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor ba gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
140b2: la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo / / de nas khya'u phyi sa khung grong khyer gyi 'obs su 'ongs pa dang yi dgas ma mthong ngo // de nas tshol ba la zhugs ste de dag yongs su tshol bas skyo bar gyur la de dag ni ma rnyed
140b3: do/ / de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am mi gzigs pa 'am mi rtogs pa'am thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig
140b4: rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa gcig tu dpa' ba zla med pa gnyis su mi gsung ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs
140b5: pa 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi la brgal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa
140b6: khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrags pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas par bya ba
140b7: drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ ma gas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur grags pas
140b8: kun tu rgyas pa brgya phrag bcub la dbang byed pa pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni chung sran dar su ni phongs
141a1: shing 'dug su ni nyam bar byur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni phongs pa dang nyam ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni ngan song du gzhol su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab su ni ngas ngan song nas byung ste/
141a2: mthongs dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/
141a3: ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sa bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/
141a4: 'dir sgras gargya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu phyis khung la pan
141a5: gdags pa'i phyid pa rlogapa thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ srung cad brnams nas dge slong gi tshigs kyis gas ring byas te/ dge slong shi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bad nas yangs pa can du bam snyoms la
141a6: pa dang / shigan zer gyis bsod snyoms bskor te/ srang du gshegs na phyis wang yang ban tshun 'khor 'khor te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'greng ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen ma
141a7: mtshan sus ban rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byed zang pa bcad bcus mnges par byas pa/ 'od 'das gang gis brgyan pa/ nyimastong pas lhag par 'ang lag rin ma ma'i ba 'thob ste tha sa
141a8: byeng gyis phyoms kyis 'bang sa sa co dus ng+yas la sems bar byab go/ bskyes nas sos ldan sa byesabs la ga la ma pa byar bas gsal pasas ca /
141b1: sems can bdag cag lta bu yang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu 'byung ba mchis te/ chud par 'gyur na bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang
141b2: ldan pa sems can rnams kyis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba mkhyen pas de shin tu skal ba dang ldan par thugs su chud nas phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu gser gyi kha dog can brgyad ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ga
141b3: slong tshur shog tshangs par spyod pa spyod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu ni bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni rdzogs par bsnyen nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug
141b4: par gyur/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to// 'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/ de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyen/ sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos gsol nas/ mod la
141b5: dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang 'bad bas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi bsten par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa
141b6: thams cad rnyil ba dang / lgang ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod do// nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod
141b7: chags dang bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang lhan pa tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes par
141b8: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de dgra bcom pa
142a1: thob zin na yang dran pa la dga' bar gyur nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ de'i dge slong phyis khung 'di ni de'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ngan don la mos pa rnams
142a2: kyi mchog yin no/ de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ tsun pa gnas brtan phyis lung gis las ci bgyis na dpa 'di sa bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur lags/
142a3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag phyis khung nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na
142a4: phyis khung nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags par rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams
142a5: dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la smin par 'gyur ro// lus can
142a6: dag gis las rnams ni/ / bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub
142a7: pan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga pa dang rnabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bu'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston/
142a8: pasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ba/ dmyal pa'i ba brang mangs ldan zhes bya ba na rten ci bzhugs so/ tshe rgyal ba'i ba phrang de khyim bdag gcig gis btsug lag 'a
142b1: zhig bcigs te/ der phyogs dang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang gnas par sems so// gtsug lag khang de na so so'i skye bo'i dge slong zhig gnas te/ de yang gnas la shin tu ser sna ches
142b2: zhig ste dge slong gsar du 'ong ba rnams mthong na tshig bza zhing 'brug la gnod sems byed de/ zhul zhul por 'du gcig 'khrug pa skyed par byed do// dge slong gang dag gtsug lag khang de nas gung du 'gro ba de dag mthong na ni/ shas
142b3: che dag zhing mchog tu dag ba skyel zhing smra bar byed do/ / ra shog na gzhi ga yul nas dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig 'ongs so// gtsug lag khang gi bdag pa de yang phyir ma 'ong ba yin// sa spyong lam gyi sgo nas dgra
142b4: ba yin par shes so/ / de nas dga' ba skyes te phye de nyin dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang bshos la spyan drangs so// dge slong bzhi pa de ni de na med pa las re shig ni phyi de nyin cho ga dang ldan pa'i
142b5: khrus kyang phul bshos kyang bshams pa las dge slong gzhi ba de yang 'ongs te/ de yang chog dang ldan pa'i khrus sar song nas/ gtsug lag khang gi bdag po mkheng rings su byung ste/ dge slong gsar bu 'ongs pa'i byi dor byed
142b6: cing 'dug pa mthong ngo / / de nas de phrag dog skyes nas/ des sdang ba'i sems kyis dag gi las rtsub po smras te/ dge slong khyed ni lus mi gtsang bas blugs kyang sla'i sbyin bdag 'di lta bu'i bsnyen bkur len pa ni de lta
142b7: ma yin no zhes byas so/ / de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs pa 'di las ches mi bzad pa'i skal pa can du gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas cang mi za bar dang du blangs so// re shig na tshogs par gyur te grol bab pa na dge slong
142b8: gzhi pa des dgra bcom pa la khyod kyis sdang ba'i sems bskyed do/ / zhes zer ba thos so// thos nas kyang de 'gyed pa skyes so// de nas dge slong dgra bcom pa de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyod la chog
143a1: rngub po smras pa de bzod par gsal lo zhes byas so/ / de nas dgra bcom pa des de'i dad pa bskyed pa'i byang nam mkha' la 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to// de nas de ldog par yang 'byung/
143a2: bskyes te/ de nas de'i mdun du las kyi nyes pa de mthol zhing bshags te shad kyis sbyangs so// 'on kyang des mthar thug pa'i ye shes bskyed nam nus so// de nas re shig na 'chi ba dus la bab pa dang nges smon lam ba
143a3: bdag gis dgra bcom pa la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa dang ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa gang yin pa las de'i rnam par smin pa ni bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig/ bdag gis klags pa dang / kha don byas pa dang sbyin pa dang
143a4: sbyin pa chen po dag byin pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus su/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par shog cag ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du
143a5: sems/ / de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhi bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyis khung 'di nyid yin te/ des dgra bcom pa la dag gi las rtsub po smras pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa
143a6: myong bar gyur te/ las de nyid kyi lhag ma lus pas da ltar srid pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe yang / 'di ltar dring zhing mchog tu dring bar gyur la mi gtsang ba dang stag steg la dga' bar gyur to/ sa kha thon byas pa dang phung po la ma 'as

143a8: datha tsam pa nyid mngan sram du byasas/ / deg sung dag de lta bas na de sa slab par byaste/ sa gsang pas brtson par byag/ tsa phyi nan/ gyis kyang sas skye bar byar gnyis pa gang ma dag 'byung bar ma 'gyur na/
143b1: dang / des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad nas bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang lha dang lham
143b2: yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lho 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rtogs pa brjod pa brgya bapa las sdom gyi tshogs su bcad pa la rdzogs so//
143b3: sdom ni/ sbrul nag dang ni zla ba dang / sa la dang ni dpal ldan mgos dang na tso bo nya dang / ma he dang ni gso sbyong dang / dad pa tha mar brjod pa yin// / sbrul nag po zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang bron
143b4: p o chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang po brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin nam sa dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi'am ci rnams dang
143b5: lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ tha mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
143b6: bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang spun gsos dang / sran zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan
143b7: dka gnas pan rten cing bzhugs sa/ / de rgyal po'i bab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag drug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa
143b8: zhig yod de/ de yang ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa// khwal yang gtor ma mi gasteng ba zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing 'phongs pa dang / bkren pa dag mthong na sems sdang bar byed do// de nas des
144a1: rang gi bskyed mos tshal du gser ma dngul gyi phung po chen po sbas te bzhag nas/ de de la chags te lhag par zhen bzhin du sha'o// de shi nas de nyid kyi steng du sprul gadrug pa sprul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig du skyes so//
144a2: denas bskyed mos tshal der skye bo'i tshogs gang song ba de dag bsdus pa tsam gyis gsod par byed do// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer pog zag tu yang cheg mo'i bskyed mos tshal dri song ba de dag thams cad brlag par 'gyur ro// zhes sdugag par
144a3: gyur to/ / skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can rnying po la gsol to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs pa de 'dul nus pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo// de nas
144a4: rgyal po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig/ du 'dug nas bcom
144a5: ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzeng stong yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/ / chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan
144a6: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzer stong yang dag par dag bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig drugazar nas sus ma
144a7: g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig na sbal gdug pa
144a8: sprul nag po chen po mig gdug pa zhig mchis te/ skye bo mang po brlag par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gdul bar gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cad mi
144b1: gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das
144b2: d e nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas bskyed mos tshal gal bde gshegs te byon nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'ong bas lhag pa dag ba
144b3: ste/ de dag gis bskyed mos tshal de dag thams cad snang bar byas so// bskal pa stong gi bar du yongs su bsgom pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/ de dag gis de'i lus la pog ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur to// de nas
144b4: sbrul gdug pa des phan tshun du bltas te/ su'i mthus bdag gis lus sim par gyur zhig gu snyam pa dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad
144b5: bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la dang
144b6: pa'i sems bskyed de/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/ bzhin bzangs dag khyod nyid kyis rdzas 'di bsgrubs pa des na khyod sbrul gdug par lhung bar byas so//
144b7: nga yang ngal dang ba'i sems skyed la gter 'di la yang sems ma chags par byos dang legs so// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar skyes ro// de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rabs dran par mdzad
144b8: pa de'i tshe de'i dus so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la/ nga ni nga yis ci byar med/ mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis// don med ngus pas ci la pan/ 'dir ni rgyal ba
145a1: xxx/ xxx
145a2: brnams pa/ de'i skabs su rgyal po dang bral ma ga kyi ba'i tshogs kyis sku gdug pa mam ldan 'das kyis la bags sa/ denas smra ga pa sa dga'as la da da 'a tshas nas mam ldan na
145a3: dga' bar gyur te shi nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu'am lha bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las
145a4: gang gis skyes snyam mo/ / de nas sbrul gdug pa las shi 'phos nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par nges mthong ngo // de nas sngon sbrul gdug par
145a5: gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du soms te/ bdag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma ljon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas
145a6: sbrul gdug par gyur pal lha'i burna cha gdu bkor dag cing mgul do thogs pa/ lus do shal dang sen me ngos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma la lo ma dang smr-i ka la sogs pas
145a7: blugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thab bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas
145a8: bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang khams dang
145b1: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/
145b2: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig tu brjod pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho skams pa dang rus pa'i ri la bsgral ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams
145b3: bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang
145b4: ming dang gnyen gyis tshegs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzad
145b5: khyod kyi mthu yis bcad/ gsod nams dang ldan mtho ras 'gro ba phye// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag ni
145b6: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal/ / 'phags pa bgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go phang thob/ mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang mche ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dga' ba yis// thub pa khyed ni de
145b7: mthong 'bras bu yod/ / de nas do shal 'chang ba dag 'gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / lha'i 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song// de nas sngon sbrul gdug par dUng ba'i
145b8: lha'i bu de tshong ba khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing ba 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nad pa nad/ thams cad las thar pa/ bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor ba de nyid
146a1: kyis/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i thad du song nas rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ rgyal po bslangs nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po longs nyal to /
146a2: de nas rgyal po sad de// 'od chen po de dang lha'i bu de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu ste khyod su zhig ces dris so// de na re bdag ni skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul gdug pa btul te shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
146a3: yul bzang por skyes pa yin bcom ldan 'das la yang bdag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ / bdag gis khyod la bstan gyis khyod song la bskyed mos tshal de'i phyogs gage mo zhig nas gter chen po byung la bdag gi
146a4: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol te yon gyi rabs kyang gdon par gsol cig/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha'i bu la cang mi mazer bas khas blangs so// de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i
146a5: 'i dus rgyal po cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi mtshan mo yul ma ga d+hA'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi rnams la bsgo nas bskyed mos tshal der song ste/
146a6: gtor phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na// des sbrul gdug par skyes lags/ las gang dag
146a7: bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des shas cher chags pa bskyed de/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang sdug cing phongs pa dang / bkren pa rnams la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa des ni/
146a8: sbrul gdug par skyes so// nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lha'i nang du skyes so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs gi ring la dge bsnyen du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang bslab pa'i ga'i blangs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to//
146b1: rgyal po chen po de bas na ser sna spangs pa'i phyir brtson par byas te// ci nas sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de nyid lha'i bur gyur pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de dag lta bur 'gyur bar rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bslab par
146b2: bya'o/ / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bstan las langs nas song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
146b3: bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// zla ba zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon pa chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams
146b4: dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur stir byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang
146b5: gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang ma zims cha dang gdan dang snyun
146b6: gsos dang sran zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa dang bram ze zhing ba zhig 'dug
146b7: pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ / de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / bu zur ste khye'u gzugs bzang
146b8: ni blta na sdug la mdzes pa skye bo thams cad kyi mig sim par byed pa zhig bcas so/ / de yang bram ze des dga' bas rnyed pa yin te/ de la bu dang mu mo gzhan yang med nas de bskyed bsrings te cher skyes nas de 'jig rten thams cad sim par byed
147a1: pa byong ma the ldam pad/ rnams kyis kyan da ya thab nas btags / nasapa tham pa'i khye mang byamams cad du brgyad ga nas/ tham zad yang dal lhag par byams par zung // cag pa
147a2: dang nyal bdan na u0f7f yang rtag tu legs par bzung bskur byed cing chug/ / blam ze da'i kyim par byas bdag sa gas dathas stod dang nyabazhigan drug// de nas tham za gyime kyis bdan ma ga pang nas sbyin dang bsnyen na
147a3: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi ladu sang te/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/ da nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dang brnyed do// de yang mo thung ste shinas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu'am lha'i bum skyes nas ring pom
147a4: lon pa ni chos nyid kyis/ / sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du byes las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las sha 'bos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems
147a5: dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo / / de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te// bdag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gis cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la
147a6: blta ba'i phyir 'gre'o snyam mo/ / de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i brarna chag du bgor dag cing 'gul de thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprika/
147a7: la sogs pas thugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud bal dang pad ma dang ku pud dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dAr rnams kyis thub pa bkang ste// rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas ma
147a8: ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor to/ / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin zugs su rung /
147b1: nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des
147b2: bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song ga sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye
147b3: ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nad mi dang mnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang
147b4: ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ / yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyis mthu yis bcad// bsod nams 'di ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag
147b5: gis thob/ / bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin du rnam dag khyod las rten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go bar thob// mi yi mchog dang dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa// skye dang
147b6: rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ / srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang //
147b7: lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bud tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nang pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang
147b8: gis bcom ldan 'das kyis thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / / dge slong dag ni srong dang tho ris mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te// de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du snang ba chen ba byung ba yang mthod do/
148a1: mthong nas kyang the chom skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lags/ mdang sum ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nas 'jig rten stong ba bzhibacom ldan 'das
148a2: bska ba'i slad du mchis lags sa ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byinanas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhing la bsgru ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin/ rnam
148a3: bzug cig pa tshagrangs shin/ / dang la sems dga' bar byur // sum bcun gsum pa'i / yul bzang po stas na// da ma dang sum zed pa sa te/ yang la chos bstanas pa na ba bya giganas /
148a4: skabs su bramazengs bug cig pasdug cing 'phags la stong du drug cing yid du bong ba dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa dang mi mngon pa mang pa de drang khrod du byed nas pa dbar bzhag ste// brang ba/ drung ba thug kyi drang bu tsa ga zhes zeng zhing 'thod //
148a5: de'i nye du rnams kyis de ltar 'tshogs kyang bslang ma nus nas de khwa dang chun lag dang bya rgod dang wa rnams kyis ni bsod/ bud meng sa gzhag pa dag dang ni 'grogs skye bo mang pos ni blta zhing 'dug go// de nas de'i bu ltar skyes pas pa/ smre sngags
148a6: 'don pa mthong nas/ snying rjes snying bskyod de// pa'i mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid drang srong gi tshi lugs su sbal nas// drang thod kyi 'dab tu dka' thab la byed cing 'dug go// de nas bram ze des drang srong de la dris pa/ kyi drang srong chen ba khyod da/ 2
148a7: thub 'dis ci zhig sdub/ / drang srong gis spras pa/ ngan rgyal srid sgrub ste// nga'i gser gyi shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis sbas pa nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i 'khor lo byas la/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni mdun nas 'dren te// shing rta la
148a8: yang zhon gangs chen po 'di bskor bar 'dod do/ / tham des smras gagal te lo brgyabs pa'i bar// rkun tu dka' thab kyad byas te/ dka' thab mchog ni spyang byas kyang // gnas khyod kyis mi 'thob// drang srong gis smras pa// khyed kyang zhiban/
148b1: khog pa mi gtsang bar shing 'dra bar gyur pa 'dis ci zhig sprub bam zes smras pa/ sdug pa'i bu gcag pa shi ste de srub po// drang srong gis smras ga gal te lo brgya tham pa'i bang// rdun tu ngu ba'i las byas kyang / bung khyod kyisar mthob/ khyod mang
148b2: kyang ci la phan/ / de nas bram ze des drang srong gi tshig bdanano snyam nas dang ba skyes so// dad pa skyes nas khyod su zhig ces dris so na drang srong gi chamags mi snang bang byas nas/ pags lugs su 'ag/ ga pa la smras pa de ba gshin mong kyi bran shar
148b3: yini som gnanas la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/ / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang po skyes nas// khyod kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so// yab khyod tshur sbyin/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su bzhud cig dang /
148b4: khyad kyang 'khor ba las 'da' bar gyur yang srid do// de nas bram ze des shi ba'i rus bu bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos gnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sun
148b5: sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhartags par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad do// de thos nas bram ze des 'jig tshags col blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mngon po nyi shu yi shes rdo rdzas pacom nas
148b6: can tu 'gas pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ / des mtho bar 'gyur ba'i rla po ba nas// bcom ldan 'das kyigabs lam ga ces phyag tshal ba la nag sum bgod pa byas te sad do// de na pa dag slong dag sa byas te/ bcom ma cad sang
148b7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis 'di ltar ba'i mya ngan bsal nas bden pa mthong ba la yang bzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge song dag / de ltang 'dis bden pa mthong nas
148b8: pha yongs su chubs pa 'di stsa la ngo mtshang chab ci yod/ 'dis ni 'das pa'i ngas na sa so'i skye bor 'dug pa'i tshe yang pags dpa la thug pa lan gsu pa skyabs byas te// de legs par rang nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
149a1: ba/ / dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sIn gzhan gyi chud mal byi ba byed pa zhig yod de/ de'i bu ni dad pa dang ldan pa dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba mi rnams shin tu grang ba zhig go// de nas re shig na de'i phas rkun po byas nas// rgyal pos gshed ma rnams la sod cig
149a2: ces bsko'o/ / de nas bus lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal po la gsol nas srog 'phangs pa byin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tsho dus na gzhan gyi chung ma la byi ba byed pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di yin no// byi ba byed
149a3: ba'i bu de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di yin no/ / dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das las ci zhig bgyis na des pa dang bu gnyig bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi di
149a4: la de gnyig dge snyan du gyur te/ skyabs su song ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas na de'i phyir da ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bas na 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyan
149a5: du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par byas te/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan
149a6: dag kyang yi ngas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// sa la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi ma rnams dang tshong dpon nams
149a7: dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi bam cernams dang lto rtse chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang
149a8: lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto ba phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang srung gsos dang sman mo rnams
149b1: brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi mtshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan du yod par sa la gcog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste// der srog chags
149b2: 'bam phrag du ma 'dus nas shang sa la'i me tog blangs tertse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ / nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gsas la'i me tog spangs te/ mnyan du yod pa'i nang du song ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyis
149b3: zham ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du ba dar nas/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad de slar gshegs nas/ bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par rgyan pa/ dpe
149b4: byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis rgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i rib 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das las la'i me tog gis/
149b5: gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ phyir log nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang gzhan dag blang ngo snyam pa dang // re shig na des sa la'i shing la 'jogs pa las lhung ste shi nas bcom ldan 'das 'das la bsnyen bkur byas nas
149b6: sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul bzang por skyes so/ / de nas re shig na lus dang gzhal med 'angs lab ma tog gas brgyan te/ lha'i 'dun sa'i nang du songango // de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bdun sa chos bzang na lha'i tshogs kyi nang na
149b7: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dag 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod cing 'dug pa las/ / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo lus dang gzhal med khangs la'i me tog gis brgyan pa dge san ba'abang ba de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de la tshigs su ba //
149b8: de smras pa/ ci phyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra bad ma ud pa la lta bur gyur// 'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'do 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur// ci yi phyir na byed kyi bzhin mdog pad ma rgyas 'dragasar
150a1: mdog lta bur gyur/ las rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong byung 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la spros// lha mos smras pa/ mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa yis// mi yi nyi mnyan thos bsam// sa la'i me tog rdul med pa// bzang po dag
150a2: gis legs par gtor/ / las dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir// bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes// bzhin mdog pad ma zla ba ltar // rnam dag 'od ldan blta na sdug/ brgya byin gyis spras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing // nyes pa thams cad rnab
150a3: spangs pa mtho res sdug par skye ba'i phyir/ / de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// bzhin mdzes pad ma' mang ba ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma// bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sa byas pa sa// sangs rgyas padam rgyas pa'i 'dab pas
150a4: 'dra ba'i spyan mda' ba/ / gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te// gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang
150a5: gis skyes snyam mo/ / de nas ma las shi 'phos pa dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te// bdag zhag
150a6: lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ / bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo rna chag ru bkod dag cing mgul do thogs pa// lus da
150a7: shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ / lus gung gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang spre ka la sogs pas blags pa da// lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag ru mas g.yog byas nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo
150a8: la'i me tog gis zhal med khang de nyid de dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te// chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
150b1: lha'i bum de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ / 'phags pa'i bden bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye/
150b2: shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhug pa'i 'bras bu thob ste// des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tsheg lan gsum brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang ngan song
150b3: ge sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams bye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis
150b4: kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ / yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bson nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// bya ngan
150b5: 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis pog/ / bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol gal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang sa thob// mi mchog dbang po lha dang
150b6: mis mchod pa/ / skye dang dga' dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni der mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas
150b7: nas kyang / / lha'i 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang / 'di ba 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du// 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das
150b8: kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / / dge slong dag ni srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur khyod pa la gnas te de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du sdang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te sangs
151a1: rgyas sam ldan 'das la zhus pa/ / bcom ldan 'das ci lags// mdang sum mo mdzad pa bdag pa tshangs pa'am lta dbang po brgya byin napa// 'dzag tan skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sa pa/
151a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ri mad kyi bdag pa tshangs pa'am/ khwa'i bang po brgya byin nas 'jig rten song ba bzhid la blta ba'i phyir 'das pa ma yinano// bu mo gang gas lam khar matog gas / gtor ba khyod kyis mthong ma/ btsun pa mthod lagasaso/
151a3: deni la sem sa dpa' ba bskyed nas sha ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzad po byas nas pa'i srid du 'angs te/ ngas de la chos bstananas bden pa mthong bar ra terang gi gnas su sa / ga slong da de bas na 'di/ bsla par byas te/ blon pa la
151a4: sti bya'o bla ma bya'or mor bya'i mchod par bya'o/ / ston pa la bkur ni byas/ bla mar byas mor byas mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong byed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// com ldan 'das kyis daskad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de /
151a5: yid ras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par spyod do// / gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgyababam po bcugasum pa/ dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang pon po chen po rnams
151a6: na pa rnams zang ma bang byam rnams tshad rnams dang da pa mas dang rnams dang burnams dpa gan rnamapa dang / ma yin rnams dang / mamapa' ljin pas da ma' benams dang / khye chen pa rnas kyis bcu
151a7: bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa bya ste/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang
151a8: gzims cha dang gdan dang sman gsos dang sman zod nams bsteg/ gnyen thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshil bya ka lan dka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying pa
151b1: rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang brtsod pa dang 'thag bzhi pa dang 'khrug pa dang nad 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang 'bras sa lu dang bu ram shing dang
151b2: ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ / gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs pa la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangs so// de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe btsun po bal
151b3: dang bcas te/ dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po gzugs can nyid po phyi zhig na pyid kyi dus bab pa'i tshe/ shing ljon pa rnams me tog rgyas la dad pa dang khrung thung dang ma bya dang ne tse dang ri gegs dang bu zug dang / shang shar ta' rnams
151b4: skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod dang bskyed mos tshal gyi sar btsun mo dam pa dang / btsun mo 'khor dang bcas te dong nas der btsun mo'i 'khor gyis rgyal po la gsol ba/ lta bdag cag ni gdugs gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi ba'i rngom thog na/
151b5: lha btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dang 'dor de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sa mo mtshad rten brtsigs te zhal gro bar cig nang / 'on kyang bdag cag gis de la chun du mar ma dang gdag pa dang / ma tog dang sbom dang ma tog zeng dang drug pa dang / gdugs dang rgya pan/
151b6: dang ba dan dag gis bkur sti bgyi'o zhes gsol to// de nas re shig na rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la dbu skra dang se mo sbal du gsol 'on tan bdag gis mchis brang 'khor du de bzhin
151b7: gshegs pa'i mchod rten btsigs te/ / zhal gro bar bgyi'o zhes gsol to// de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das kying dbu skra dang / sen mo byin nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas/ btsun mo'i 'khor ci nang du bkrung shA
151b8: po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal sros nas/ de la btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mar me dang bdug pa dang me tog dang spos dang me tog phreng dang thug pa dang gdugs dang rtsal mtshan dang bdan dag nas kyang
152a1: mcha byed/ nas ga / rgyal pa sa skyes dgra ltas byin kyis sa / ya chom dang ldan pa tshas bzhin du rgyal pa d+ha sa nas nga rgyal pa thugs pa dmal na nas stan 'a sa mamam na man/ yang bzhanagan
152a2: pa'i 'i tshad rten pab sten byed ciganas khrims kyang bas pa/ den ga sas nas la gas byed pa'i rjes pabab de bza pa sa da da lasas ga da byed pa'am mang ma dang badrag pa dang dpas med / na dzus
152a3: da da khyang ba pa la lags/ san sa na/ kanyi na sa nas kyi pa dazla pa 'a ga pa sa pa 'thams na
152a4: dnga' ldan mashes bya ba sa nga gis tshig dang bsngos / sangs byas kyi yon nardzas sa ngananas dab tha dang na ma'i mtshan rten ma byug dang byas te// nga ma'i phreng ba dang pa// de nasar shigan rgyal lam skyes dgra' pa btsugs pa'i steng dbyung // rdza na
152a5: bdi mam napa 'ang cigag ces dris pa dang / bshigan gzhan nigags dpa la ldanam pa dab zla dang ngan po mdzad na la mang pa'i phreng ba dang ba lags san byas / den sa dpal ldanam bcug gi ci byor byed kyi rgyal ba bka' ba cas cas smras sa/
152a6: ngan bdag gis byad kyis bka' ba cag lags kyang bdag gis chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal ba gzugs can nyid po'i bka' ma bcag gnyis thang ro// nas de grom na pa'akhor la 'bang sa te ba sa dang / dbacom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byes
152a7: gnas thams cagasas pa'i tshul ba yor byas / / na na/ tham pa la nas sa da pa' ba ca dpag ca ga gas pa nga ldan pa sadun pa na du pa / na
152a8: byad kyis snang bcan pa de da 'i dpag tshad gcig pa mtsha sa gci khyo da kyis sa na gas na da na pal/ zang rdzag 'din ma pa ma tshus med kyad kyims lapa nga byung da
152b1: gyur/ / ci'i phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur// las rnams gang gis 'bras bu myong gyur 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la spros// lha mos smras pa/ 'jig rten gsum mgon 'gro ba'i sgron cig po// mtshan mchog rnams kyis
152b2: phrug pa'i sangs rgyas mthong / / spra mchog nyon mongs mun pa sel ba la// mun pa sel ba'i mar me yon du phral// zla ba'i 'od zer mdog dang 'dra ba'i 'od// mthong nas thub la snying nas dang bskyes// 'od zer mthong nas dga' bar gyur pa yis// ston pa smra ba'i
152b3: mchog la phyag kyang bgyis/ / las dag de 'dra byas pa'i phyir// bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes// zhing mdog pad ma zla ba ltar// nam dag 'od ldan blta na bsdug/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ kye ma yon tan nyid kyis zhing // nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa//
152b4: mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir// de la khyed kyis sa bon btab// bzhin mdzes pad ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma// bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur sti byas pa yi// sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan
152b5: mangs ba/ / gser mchog phung ba lta bur ma dang sa da/ ra de la su mi mchod// 'i bubam lha'i bu ma skyes nas ring ba ma lan pa na chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te// gang nas shi'i bos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyams/
152b6: de nas mi las shi 'bos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsam pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'dam la sems dga' bar 'gyur bar des mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'di snyam du sams te/ bdag zhag lan nas bzod yong
152b7: ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi snang bas gang ba nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog yud pa la dang
152b8: pad ma dang ku srad dang pad ma dkar ba dang man dAr rnams kyis thub bkar sa/ / rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'ad chen pos snang bar byas nas// bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
153a1: 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis l+h+wa bumo dpal ldan pa'i bsam pa dang bag lanyal dang / khabs dang rang bzhin thugs su grad nas/ 'phags pa'i bdedan pa bzhi rtogs par byung ba de ga bu'i chos bcan
153a2: te/ / de thos nas lha'i bu mo dpa' ldan pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ kun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod do// btsun pa bcom ldan
153a3: 'das kyis bdag ga khrag dang mchis ni rgya mtsharnams pa dang / rus pa'i la bskal ba dang dan song ge sgonams bcad pa dang / mtho ba dang thar pa'i sgo rnams b+ha ba dang bdag lta dang mirnams can du bzhag pa 'di lta ba nani bdag la pas da
153a4: ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so//
153a5: yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyis mthu yis bcad/ bsod nams rab ldan mtho ras 'grob bya// bya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i
153a6: maH/ shin dun ma dag khyod las brten nas thob/ g+sa panas rgya mtshapha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// li mchog dpa' bo ma dang lhas mchod pa/ b+h+ya dang na dang 'chi ba'i nad sbyangs pa// srid pa stong
153a7: mthong bar dka' ba yi/ / thub pa khyod ni ded mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// bdud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas m+b+ha
153a8: yul song/ / de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma// chong pa kha spogs phyin pa dang // zhab 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor ba gang gis btsa
153b1: ldan 'das kyi thang du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / / dge slong dag ni srong dang thos mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thar du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong
153b2: nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta bar
153b3: slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin napa leg rten spyong pa bzhi la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i/
153b4: btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya bas rang gi srog dang bsngos te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu sra dang sen po'i mchod rten la mar me'i phreng ba mang ra nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra khros pas bsad de/
153b5: de de la dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ shi ste sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas// deng mdangs sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te// des de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag de
153b6: bas 'di ltar bslab par byas te/ / ston pa la bkur sti bya'o// bla mar bya'o ri mo bya'o mchod pa bya'o// ston pa la bkur sti byas bla bar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par
153b7: bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// // gos shes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon
153b8: po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams
154a1: dang / / byi can pa rnams kyis bkur ma byas/ bla mar byas mod byas mdzod par byas te/ ya dang thu da nga gnod sbyin dang la ma yon dang nam ma 'a lding dang ma'as ca dang na rgya chen pa rnams kyis mtshad cing gam pa nga sa ma
154a2: bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang shal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang spyan gsos dang sman thong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim
154a3: bdag ma gnamed zas sbyin gyi kun dpar ba nas bzhugs so/ / de nas gang gi ci khyim bdag mgon med pas sbyin gyis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed/ tshal dul te// mthar gyis gas sa
154a4: bye brag brgyabacom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la phul ba dang ma de'i blosmras pa mal bdag sbyin bdag sbyin ning bsod nams dag byed pa 'di ltal ngomam 'chab ci yad kyis/ / bdag gas skye ba dbul ba rnams la phan gdags pa'i byer
154a5: mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skyeb rnams dad pa bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur bya'o// de ltar byas pa dang bdag gis skye bo mang po la yang phan gdags par gyur la// bsod nams mang
154a6: yang bskyed par gyur ro snyam mo/ / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ji ltar bsams pade/ la po la gsol nas// ma pos kyang nyan du yod thams cad du dri'i bsgragasate/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mkhyed rnams nyon cig/
154a7: der na bzhag bdun na khyim dag ma na mid zas sbyin gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir glang po che la zhon te// dang pa sdud par 'dod kyis khyed gang gis ji tsam yongs su gtang bar bya ba de yongs su gtang bar gyis shig/
154a8: ces bsgo'o// de nas ra shig na zhag bdun lon pa dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin glang po che la zhon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir dang bsdud pa la zhugs te// der gang dag la ji tsam bdog pa de dag de tsal sbyin par byed
154b1: do/ / kha cig ni mgul gyi sa mo do sbyin par byed/ kha gcig nig du bu sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni dpung brgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni gser gyis phreng ba sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni sor gdub kyi rgyan sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni mu tig gi do shal sbyin par byed/ kha cig
154b2: ni gser sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni dngul sbyin par byed/ kha cig ni tha na zho'i brgyad cha tsam yang sbyin par byed do// khyim ba dag de yang bzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir len par byed do// de nas re shig na bud med shin du dbul mo zhig gis sha thar ste/ zla ba gsum
154b3: gyis ras yug cig rnyed nas des ras de gyon te srad du zhugs pa dang / des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dud 'bud cing rnga zlum rdung bzhin du rgyang nas 'ong ba mthong nas des dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa ji ste// khyim bdag 'di phyug cing nor ma nga la longs
154b4: spyod che ste/ gter sa'i 'og tu sbas pa rnams kyang mthong na/ ci'i phyir 'di gzhan gyi khyim nas slong zhing skor bar byed ces byas pa dang / dge snyen de na re gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir de gang dag bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
154b5: pa/ bshos gsol mi nus pa de dag gi don du phan 'dogs par byed de// ci nas mang po bsdongs te bcom ldan 'das la 'bul du 'jug go zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo de'i blo skyes pa/ 'o na bdag ni bsod nams ma byas pa yin la/ bdag gcig pus
154b6: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba'i mthubad ga la med kyis/ bdag gis 'di la cung zad dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas bdag nyid la ci bdog ces bltas na ras yug cig ma gags pa gzhan
154b7: ci yang ma mthong ste/ ngas bsams pa gal te bdag 'di na 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phul na ni bdag gcer bur byung gis bdag khang thog du song la ras dor ro snyam mo// de nas de khang thog du song nas rang gi lus las ras phud te/ khyim bdag
154b8: mgon med zas sbyin gyi steng du bor ba dang / khyim bdag nges kyang 'phrigs te/ 'dis khang thog nas bor ba las na/ 'di la nor deng las me dgor ma chag snyam nas rang gi g.yog rnams la bsgo ba khyed deng la ras 'di sus por bltos shig ces
155a1: byas nas/ de dag gis bltas pa dang re shig na bu mo de tseg tsog por 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas de dag gis dris pa dang / de na re bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan brjod pa/ bdag gis thos nas dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag steb /
155a2: gis gos rnyed pa de de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo// zhes zer ro// de nas de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la byas so// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bra
155a3: mo de la gos dang rgyan rnam pa sa tshogs bskon to/ / de nas da tshe thung ste shinas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te// skyes mthag tu lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gzhan sul yang med pa de lta bu'i dgos dag de la byung ngo // lha'i bu'am d+ha /
155a4: bu mo skyes nas ring po malon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes skam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /
155a5: bcom ldan 'das la ras phul bar des mthong ngo // de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub ba kor dag cing 'gul de thogs pa/ lus do shal dang se mo des brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa'i cod pan can
155a6: lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprig ka la sogs pa byugs pa des/ / de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang // pad ma dang ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra rnams kyis thub pa gang ste// rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
155a7: tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyar sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo
155a8: bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mos 'jig tshegs la lha ba
155b1: ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i rig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgyam
155b2: bsams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams bye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyi sems kyang ma bgyis
155b3: rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so// yang smras pa// nyes pa
155b4: mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ / shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu
155b5: rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob/ / bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa// srid pa stong du mchod/
155b6: bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de
155b7: nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing ba 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul la rgyal ba dang nang ba nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs
155b8: pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / / dge slong dag na srod dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tshom skyes te/ sangs
156a1: byas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byinan pa 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'as la nyal srid du mchis lags sa ma// bcom ldan
156a2: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i'adab pob byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhing la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
156a3: dad pa bdud par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/ / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/ de mdang gsum de'i thang du 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan nas/ bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dgar
156a4: bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la bkur mi bya'o// kur sti med par mi bya'o// zhes dge slong byed kyis da ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong de dag yid
156a5: te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / // ne tso zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / blon po chen po rnams dang / phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang /
156a6: ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu
156a7: dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan/
156a8: dang / snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
156b1: khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed do/ / de'i ring la 'byor ba dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mdo gang ba dang / brtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhib dang 'khrug pa dang nad 'khrug pa dang chom thun dang mug
156b2: dad nams med pa dang 'bras sa lu dang bu ram shong dang ba lang dang mahe dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid basbyangs so// rgyal po de yang dag pa dang ldan la dge zhing bas
156b3: bam pa bka' na dgazhazhal ban pa la zhugs te/ snying rje rje ba bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa skye dgul byams pa zhig go// de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das mthang bar smon te/ lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go//
156b4: de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad par rgyal bas smras pa/ ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma mthong ngo // ngas bde bar gshegs pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo // da ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'dod do// de nas
156b5: bcom ldan 'das nyin par gnas pa la zhugs pas/ lha'i stan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po smon pa gsan to// de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am mig
156b6: pa 'am mi rtogs pa 'am thugs su mi chud pa ci yang med la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa gcig tu dpa' ba zla med pa/ gnyis su mi
156b7: gsung ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa 'dul ba'i gzhig gsum la mkhas pa// chu bo bzhi las rgal ba rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gzhi'i zhabs
156b8: kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ / khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro
157a1: ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar
157a2: gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum
157a3: mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni chung su ni dar su ni 'phongs shing 'dug su ni nyam nga bar gyur su ni gnod pa dang ldan su ni 'phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan su ni ngan song du gzhol
157a4: su ni ngan song du 'bab su ni ngan song du bab/ su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste// mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/
157a5: 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang phyed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi bskyed pa las bskyed par bya// su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni yongs su smin zin pa las rnam
157a6: par grol bar bya snyan du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ / 'dir smras pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med// de nas bcos
157a7: ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas ljongs rgyu zhing mthar gyis gshegs pa las
157a8: nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang / nags khrod de na ne tso mi skad shes pa zhig gnas te// bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo // de nas shin tu rings par song ste// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das tshun
157b1: gshegs/ / bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so// bdag la phan gdags su gsol// nags khrod 'di kho nar gshegs dgongs gdab par gsol zhes byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ne co de la phan gdags pa'i phyir
157b2: shing gang lan tso gnas pa de'i drung du nA' gangan bting nas skyil mo bkrung bcas te bzhugs so/ / nyan thos chen po rnams ni shing bzhan dag gi drung du 'khod do// de nas ne tses bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la ma 'ab ma yin pa
157b3: 'amaganod sbyin nam/ srin pa'am dgasasam gcan zan gnod pa byed du dogs te/ mtshan thog thag nags khrod den pan tshun bskor bar byed do// de nas nam langs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum paskor ba byas nas pacoM
157b4: pa gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa lags pas/ bdag la bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i rgyu ci yang ma mchis na bzod pa mdzad du gsol// de lta lags kyis kyang bdag sngon du mchis te// rgyal
157b5: gzugs can snying po la bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes sman par 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas re shig na de bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon du chas te mthar gyis rgyal po'i thang du
157b6: phyin to/ / de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po ni khang bzangs kyi snying na bud med 'ba' zhig dang sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de nas ne tsomi skad shes pa des rgyal po la smras pa kye rgyal po khyod mkhyen par mdzod cig/
157b7: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyod kyimungab du gshegs lags kyis/ khyod kyis bshos lha gon mdzad pa'i rigs so zhes byas so// de nas rgyal po shin tu rings par yang bzangs kyi steng nas babs nas// then po che
157b8: po'i tshigs kyis zham ring byas te/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rnams bshams nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams dang bdug pa dang / spos dang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu'o// de nas bcom ldan
158a1: 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas nang du spyan drangs nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas so// de nas na tsa de 'di snyam du sems te// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rtsa
158a2: 'byor pa 'di dag thams cad ni dag gi yon yin no snyam du rig nas dga' zhing mgul yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po'i mdun logs su pan tshun lding ba las khras khyer te bsang // bcom ldan da
158a3: la sems dga' ba bskyed te sha bas ni sum bcum gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so/ / lha'i bu'am lha'i bum skyes nas ring po malon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skya bar 'gyur te// gang nas sha 'a bos gang du skyes
158a4: las gang gis skyes snyam mo/ / de nas dud 'gro las 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon ne tsar gyur pa lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems
158a5: te/ / bdag zhag lan nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyis bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon ne tsar gyur pa lha'i burna chag du ba kor dag
158a6: cing 'gul ba zags pa/ sus do shal dang sa mdos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin pa che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang / smig ka la sogs pas blugs pa des/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog lung
158a7: pa la dang pad ma dang ku mud dang pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos nyan pa'i phyir btsam
158a8: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon no tser gyur pa'i lha'i bu bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
158b1: chos bstan te/ / dbos nas sngon na gtsar gyur pa'i lha'i bum 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i dri rgya mo mngon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rkun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste// des bden pa mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshig la na gsul brjod de//
158b2: bcan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang / sami sa'i rgyamatsha bskams pa dang / rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan sang gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ras dang thar ba'i sgo rnams bye ba dang / bdag tu dang sernams kyinang du bzhag pa 'dis
158b3: bu ni bdag la pas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ / lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ nang ma dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngan gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge slong dang brab
