158b4: ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/ / yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan sor lam/ shin tu me bzad khyod kyis mthu yis bcad/ bsod nam pa rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/
158b5: bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tunam dag khyod las rten nas thob/ bdag ni thug bsngal rgya mtsha ba ra la rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'bang ba ba// ma mchog dpa' ba midar lhas mchod pa// b+ha dang rgadang /
158b6: 'che ba'i nang spangs pa// srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba'i// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskong ba byas nas kyang/
158b7: lha yi 'jig tan ba ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon na tsar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshod pa khe spogs byin pa dang / zhing ba 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang / nang ba nad thams cad lam thar pa bzhin du 'byur ba gang gas/
158b8: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong dag ni srong dang mthongs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen ba byung ba sa bang nga/
159a1: mthong nas kyang thi tshim skyes te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das
159a2: la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong ba bzhing la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no//
159a3: ne tse gang gis nags khrod der nub mo'i dgongs mal la spyan drangs pa de khyed kyis mthong ngam// dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ dge slong dag
159a4: ne co de nyid shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa de yin no/ / dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa sngon ne tser gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na/ des ni tsor skyes lags ga las gang dag brtsa
159a5: nades lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon ne tser gyur pa'i lha'i bus tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za
159a6: bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ / sngon ne tser gyur pa'i lha'i bus las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te// dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams
159a7: na phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa
159a8: phung po dang khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chung mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par
159b1: 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgra'i che lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs
159b2: ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes pa bdul bu'i ba lo sbyar ba / bla na med pa/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'ong srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung sa/ de grang khyer bA ra Na mAn rten
159b3: cing bzhugs so/ / de nas re shig na dge bsnyen cig 'dug pa des bslab pa ltung bar byas te las de'i rnam par smin pas ni ne tsor skyes so// de la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni ltar skyes so// des bslab pa'i gan
159b4: lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar 'gyur to/ / dge slong dag de ltar na des gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar
159b5: ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /
159b6: las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
159b7: nas/ / dge slong de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / po nya zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang
159b8: brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang / klu nams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti
160a1: bras bla mar byas ramar byas mchod par byas te/ lha dang grwadang gnod sbyin dang lham yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lho 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang /
160a2: ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang gdan dang spyan gsas dang sman zad rnams brnyas ga/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pargyal ba'i khaban 'od ma'i tshil bya ka lan da ka gnas par dbyar gnas par dam bcas sa// de nas
160a3: khyim bdag sa medapas sbyi gas la'i rgyal po gas la rgyal gal bder song sa phyin nas rgyal po la rtul bar gyur cig/ tshe ring bar shog cig ces bstod nas gsal ba btab pa/ lhamakhyen par mdzad drags pa/ bdag gis btsam /
160a4: 'das yun dang mo zhig tu ma mthong ste/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skam lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes byas so// de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/ khyim
160a5: bdag bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du dbyar gnas par bzhed pa khyod kyis ci thos/ mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ lha bdag gis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par dam pazhes so zhes thos lags so// dan
160a6: kas la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la sogs pa po brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul ba dang blon po rnams kyis mi zhig po nyar bkug te/ kye mi khyod tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song la/ der byin
160a7: nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal la/ bdag cag gi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngamanyam nga ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang dam 'tshe'am stobs dang ldan nam bde ba dang ldan nam mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am bdab
160a8: la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/ 'di skad du btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring /
160b1: bzhog tu ma mthong bas/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skem lags so// bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gso pa/
160b2: zhes mchi'o zhes gsol cig ces bska'o// de nas mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang blon po dang ba zang 'khor gyi med yul mi rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du banyan ka/ rgyal po'i bab du song nas mthang kyis ming song b.las rgyal po'i bkyi grong byed du byed pa/ nas rgyal ca
160b3: khab kyi grong khyer thams cad du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsal/
160b4: sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gnod pa nyung ngamanyam nga ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam 'tsho'am
160b5: stobs dang ldan nam bad ba dang ldan nam mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes mchi'o// 'di skad du bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das ring ma zhig tu ma mthong ste/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar
160b6: 'tshal bas nas lags so/ / bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs su gsol zhes kyang mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
160b7: kyigs teng rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'gro ster na 'gro bar bya'o/ / de nas pa nyidas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegs par rgyam
160b8: gzugs can snying pas dad pa su lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mid la cang mi gsung bas gan da // de nas bcom ldan
161a1: 'das dbyar zla gsum 'das nas/ chos gos mdzad de chos gas ze nas chos gos gsol te// slang bzad bsdams nas nam 'bring la khor mang po dag dang mnyan du yod pa lags su nas te gshegs so// nyaya u0f7f/
161a2: d+hal non te chas so// de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnabs kyis gshegs pa mthong nas shing rta las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar rab btung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di sa ces gas
161a3: zugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shing rta nga // yang dag stsol lang gnas nas// nyon mongs tshams ma snang bar// sas+yA
161a4: kun tu rgyu bar byed/ / pho nyas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das na rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang / bdag la phan gdags pa dang thugs brtse ba'i slangad du bcibs su gsol de nas bcom ldan 'das pa
161a5: phan gdags pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta'i steng du bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rtal bcibs bzhin du mnyan du yod par byon nas po nyas kyang rgyal po la sbran to// de nas rgyal po dang blod po dang pho brang 'khor gyi
161a6: mi dang yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu nas chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan mo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi ral de nyid du 'khod to/ / po nya de ni tshe thung ste chos thos pa'i 'og tu de nyid kyi mtshan mo she ste/ de shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum
161a7: pa'i lha yul bza' bor skyes so/ / lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas mi las shi 'phos pa
161a8: dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te bdag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das
161b1: la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni ga ga nam yid kyis/ bdag nag ma len par bcom ldan 'das la blta pa'i phyir 'gro'o snyam ma// de nas sngon pa nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bun chag du bkar dag car 'gul ba thogs pa/ lus dashal dang sa ma
161b2: dos brgyan pa nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang ku mud dang pad ma dang pad ma dkar
161b3: bo dang man dAr rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas
161b4: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon po nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bstan te/ de thos nas sngon po nyar gyur
161b5: pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
161b6: kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bskal ba dang ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la
161b7: k yang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang
161b8: babagyis lags so/ / yang smras pa nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis tho ba// bdag gi
162a1: de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu na mdag khyod las rten nas thob// bdag ni badrag bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhiba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa/ skye
162a2: dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/ / srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni der mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba
162a3: byas nas kyang / / lha'i 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song // de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing ba 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nang pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor
162a4: pa gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pas snang ba chen po de mthong nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan
162a5: 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags ma dang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong pa bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
162a6: stsal pa rgyal po chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam 'jig rten skyong pa bzhing la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyis/ khyod kyi pho nya de la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste sum bcu rtsa gsum
162a7: pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas da ma dang sum nga'i thangad du 'ongs te/ des de la chos stan te bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas kye ma sangs rgyas kye mchos kye ma dge 'dun 'di dag
162a8: la ni chung zhig las kyang rnam par smin pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ / de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
162b1: mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas stan las langs te song ngo / / der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gsum ni mchog du gdags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags
162b2: pa dang chos mchog tu gdags pa dang dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o/ / sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ sems can rkang med rnams sam rkang gnyis rnams sam rkang bzhi rnams sam rkang mangs rnams sam gzus
162b3: can rnams sam gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam 'du shes can rnams sam 'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam 'du shes yang ba yang ma yin 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra /
162b4: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par bstan to// sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang
162b5: du ltar gyur pa rnams sam/ mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/ 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas
162b6: kye chos rnams gang yang rung ste de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par ston to/ / chos la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni nas
162b7: bar smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du ltar gyur pa rnams sam mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'don chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na
162b8: tshogs sam 'dus pa 'am mang po'am 'khor gang yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par bstan te/ dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba
163a1: yin te mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du ltar gyur pa rnams sam mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu
163a2: gdags pa zhes bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod brgya pa bam po bcu bzhi pa/ ma
163a3: zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang po brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin/
163a4: rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod par byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
163a5: kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang rlan gsos dang / sman zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ko sa la'i ljongs
163a6: rmya zhing gshegs pa las nags khrod gcig tu byon pa las/ nags khrod de na ma he'i khru chen po dang ma he rdzi lnga brgya 'khod do// de nas re shig na de'i nang na ma he stobs dang ldan zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ de mi gzhan dag
163a7: go dri tsher na phyi bzhin rgyug par byed do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so// de nas ma he rdzi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa thag ring po zhi ga nas mthong ngo // de nas de dag gis skad cher pos
163a8: te bcom ldan 'das 'don ma he ma rungs pa mchis kyis/ / shul 'dir mi gshegs su gsol zhes byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye ngas 'di dus la bab par shes kyis snying mchung shig/ de nas ma he des bcom ldan 'das thag/
163b1: ring mo zhig nas mthong ba dang rngam ldang du gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der bkrugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun logs su seng ge ral pa can ral pa g.yengs pa lnga sprul te/ glo g.yas g.yon du mo chen po lnga sprul to// steng
163b2: du ni lcags kyi pha bod chen po zhig sprul to/ / de nas ma he des phyogs kun tu 'jigs pa chen po mabong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lces bldags nas zhum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das
163b3: la bltas so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la/ des brda' phrad pa'i skad du bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni ma rtag pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// zhes chos tshig gsum bstan
163b4: nanas tshe rabs kyang dran par mdzad de des thos nas dus so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la// da ni nga yis tsa~M byar yod// mi khom par ni skyes zin kyis// don med dus
163b5: pas ci la phan/ 'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can// nga la dad pa'i sems skyed la// dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs// 'on kyang mthong ris 'gro bar 'gyur de nas ma he ma rungs pa des rang gi lus la smad de kha 'chos nas/ dud 'gro ba skye
163b6: gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags rnams ni me'i drod che bas de rkyen par shi ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/
163b7: gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes/ las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo // de nas sngon ma
163b8: ter gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ ba dag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon ma he/
164a1: dUr pa'i lha'i bu rna cha bdu bkor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/ lus do shal dngos modos pa rgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang smrig ka la sogs pas
164a2: thugs pas des de nyid kyi mtshan sa lha'i me tog yud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu dang pad ma dkar po dang san dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ nags khrod de dag thams cad 'od chen po snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog sheg
164a3: te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chung nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs
164a4: par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshes bstan te/ de thos nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i
164a5: tshig lan gsum du brjod de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang / ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag lha
164a6: dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nad mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma/ bgyis lags so/
164a7: / yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song las// shin tu ma bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ras 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis de ring
164a8: nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa dgyes pa zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// me mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i
164b1: nang spangs pa/ srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyarab dga' 'gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thuthal ni bskor ba byas nas kyang / lha yi 'jig rten kha
164b2: lAs lha yul song / / de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa la spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nang ba nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thang /
164b3: du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su so ngo // de nas ma he rdzi de dag gis snang ba chen po de mthong ngo // de mthong nas the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
164b4: mdang sum bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/ lha'i 'od kyis snang bar bgyis pa de su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi ma he deng la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul
164b5: bzang por skyes te de ma dang sum nga'i thang du 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bstan te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas ma he rdzi de dag mchog tu ya mtshan tu gyur te ngo mtshar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa
164b6: 'di yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang phrad nas lha'i nang du skyes te/ bden pa mthong bar gyur na bdag cag gis ci ste khyad par thob par mi 'gyur snyam mo// de nas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
164b7: kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du rab tu byung ste/ de dag gis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
164b8: du byas so/ / de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na/ des ma her skyes lags las gang dag bgyin/
165a1: na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/ ma he rje 'di rnams kyis ni las ci bgyis na des mahe rdzir gyur lags/ las gang gyis pas ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis latra
165a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags
165a3: pas na/ de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i kham
165a4: dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang me dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus
165a5: can dag gi las rnams ni/ / bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub
165a6: pan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i 'alo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa
165a7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sIn drang srong sme ba ri dgas kyi gnas na rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong dag gtan la 'bebs par byed pa na// dge slong sde snod gsum
165a8: bzhig 'khor lnga brgya dang gtan la 'babs pa'i nang na 'dug go/ de'i nang ni slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong dag kyang yod de dag sde snod gsum pa la 'dri bar byed la/ des ni lan ma thebs pa dang / de khros nas dag gi las nub ba byung /
165b1: nags kyi ma te dang 'dra ba 'di dag ca shes zhes byas so// de'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang ma he rdzi dang 'dra ba 'di dag ci shes zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dge slong sde snod gsum/
165b2: pa gang yin pa de nyid ma ha 'di yin no// slob ma de dag ni ma ha rdzi 'di dag yin te/ las des na tshe rabs lnga brgyar maher skyes so// slob ma rnams kyang mahe rdzi lnga brgyar gyur to// nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa des ni lhar skyes so// dge slong
165b3: gi dngos po thob ste tshul khrims bsrungs pas ni bden pa mthong ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ / dge slong dag de bas na dag gi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya ste/ ci nas ma he dang ma he rdzi rnams kyi nyes pa de lta bu dag
165b4: 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu de'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
165b5: kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / / bstan gnas zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams 'tshod dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang ldan ma
165b6: dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod pa bya ste/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam
165b7: mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang stan gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/
165b8: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas zhes bya ba zhig yod na/
166a1: dmam can par byor rtag tubacom ldan 'das kyi yang du 'tha'o// danas kyis shigan lta khri bsnyen gnas ga ga kho lngab dang mas pa/ btsam ldan 'dasagal pa dang sang sa phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rnabs lam
166a2: bos phyag 'tshal te chom mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu bsten gnas kyi bsam pa dang pags nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chung nam/ 'phags pa'i bde pa ban rtogs par 'gyur ba
166a3: ltabu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon pa nyi shus shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyan tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste// des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod ni mun
166a4: pabacom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ba skams pa dang rus pa'i la bsgral pa dang na song ga sgornams bcad pa dang mtho sa dang thar pa'i sgo rnams bye ba dang bdag lnga dang mi rnams kyis nang du bzhag pa 'dis bum / l
166a5: alas kyang ma bgyi sems kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshigs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis
166a6: lags so/ / yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i din song lam/ shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mtha yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mthor sa 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// bdag gis deng nga na par grangs
166a7: ba mog/ shin tu nam dag spyod las brten nas thab// bdag na sdug bsngal rgya mtsha rol rgal// dpags pa byas panipa go bang pob// ma ga dbang pos dang sas mamod pa// skye dang na dang 'chi ba'i na pa/
166a8: bstong du thong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyad na dang mthang 'bras bu yod// denas da shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyur te// btu cing zhabs gnyis lan phyag 'tshal nas// dgra zub la ni bzh-ir ba byas nas kyang // b+ha la 'jig ces
166b1: g+has lha phul song/ da nas ti bu bsnyen gnas tshong ba la spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nang pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi tha~Mng du//
166b2: 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // de'i tshe dge slong dag srod dang the ros mi nyal bar brtson par lhur byed pa la gnas de de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po zung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang the tshom
166b3: skyes dethe tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin na pa 'jig rten sbyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la
166b4: blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam 'dzag rten skyong ba bzhang la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/ lha'i bu
166b5: bsnyen gnas g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa dal blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas
166b6: bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lta'i bu bsnyen gnas galas b+hur lags/ mang ni ci las btags lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byed nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa// btsun pa nyan par
166b7: la lags so/ / ka yul pa dag slong dag ben legs pa bdutsun la yid bzung shig dang ngas pa shad do// dge slong dag ldan ldang das pa'i dras na/ bkal la bzang pa 'di na la skyed gra kyil te khri thab pa na bzhin ga sham
166b8: padagra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ / bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sbyar ba// blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
167a1: 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sIn drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhugs so// phyis re shig na rgyal po kri kri bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song
167a2: de nas re shig na bram ze gnyis drang srong smra bar don zhig la song ba dang / de gnyis kyis rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa mthong ngo // de nas de gnyis rgyal srid la 'dod pa skyes nas/ de gnyis kyis dge ba ste/
167a3: zhig la dris te/ kye sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen las ci zhig byas na/ des ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes byas so// dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/ gang gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa
167a4: yongs su dag par bsrungs pa de'i ni ci bsams pa dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/ / de nas bram ze de gnyis kyis khyim bdag chu stong las bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa blangs te bsrungs so// /
167a5: de nas gcig gis ni yongs su dag par bsrungs te/ de nas shi nas rgyal po kri kri'i bur skyes te/ de'i bu'i ming legs skyes shes btags nas pha shi ba'i 'og tu de rgyal por bcug go/ gcig shos kyis ni bsnyen gan pa nyams
167a6: par byas te de ni gnas klu'i nang du skyes te/ de'i steng du nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bye tshan babaste des rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byed do// de nas de 'di nyam du sa te/ dil sa gang thas pa shing di lag shi sa na pa dzin
167a7: zhi de khadag gis 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myod ni 'du gyur ro/ / de nas des bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ bdag gis blangs pa las bslab pa lhod par byas pa des 'dig bu'i sdug bsngal ba dag gis nyams su myong
167a8: la gang gis blangs te bsrungs pa des na rgyal srid thob par 'gyur to snyas so/ / yang de 'di snyam du sems te// de yang bdag gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrung bar bya'o// 'on kyang bdag klu'i skyes gnas las
167b1: thar par 'gyur yang srid do snyam mo/ / de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bdag nyid sprul nas/ rgyal po'i thad du song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig sku che ring bar shog cig ces bstod nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bsnyen gnas yan
167b2: lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag la 'tshal gyis/ lha bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa btsal du gsol// gal te ma btsal na gdong mi 'tshal bar lha'i dbu tshol ba bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas de nyid du me snang bar
167b3: gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag ste/ mi dga' la spyi bud zhes byas nas gser 'bum yod pa'i snod rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ bdag gi yul thams cad du dril bsgrags nas/ su nga la bsnyen gnas yan lag
167b4: brgyad dang ldan pa ston pa de la gser 'bum 'di sbyin no/ / bkur sti chen pos kyang bkur bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o// de nas re shig na shing mkhan gyi bu mo bud med rgan mo zhig 'dug pa des/ rgyal po la ka ba zhig bstan te/ sngon bdag gi pha rtag
167b5: tu ka pa 'di la spos dang bdug pa dang me tog gis mchod pa bgyid na/ 'di phyung ste gzigs zhes byas so// de nas rgyal pos zham 'bring pa rnams la ka pa 'di phyung shig ces bsgo'o// de nas rgyal po'i zham 'bring rnams kyis ka /
167b6: de byung ba dang / de'i 'og nas bstan gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gser gyi glegs bam la bris pa zhig rnyed do// de nas rgyal
167b7: pos klu de la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bris ste byin no/ / drang srong smra ba na gnas pa'i drang srong khri nyis stong gis kyang byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i tshes sum bcu rtsa bdun mngon sum du byas so// klu des kyang
167b8: bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrungs nas thad la phyung ste lus por nas kha 'chos te 'dug go/ / de nas de shi ste g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so// dge
168a1: slong dag bsnyen gnas ni de las byung ste ming yang de las btags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
168a2: dad pa zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / ded dpon rnams dang / lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin
168a3: rnams dang l+h+wam yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnad sbyi ni dang lta ma yin dang dam mkha' ldi dang mi
168a4: 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
168a5: kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas byin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/ de'i ringal 'byor pa
168a6: d ang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi meng pos gang ba dang rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nad 'khrag dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang 'bras sa lu dang bu ram shing drang ba lang dang ma he dang
168a7: ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid sbyangs so// phyi sa re shig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang brnyan bkur bya ba'i phyi rgyal bu rgyal
168a8: byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / bany+tsa la'i rgyal pos/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la dad pa la brgya skyes su bskur te gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du sos de'i tshe dang pa lnga brgya po de dag dul lo// de nas rgyal po
168b1: gsal rgyal gyis dad pa de dag la ma 'jigs pa byin te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du btad nas/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsol zhing bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ dad pa de dag
168b2: bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du 'gro la/ bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang de rnams la khyos ma byin te/ de dag gis zos nas tshim zhing mgul dbang po rtas te 'khod do// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang
168b3: ngag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor bzhi po de dag la chos ston pa de'i tshe/ dad pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste chos nyan par byed do// de nas de dag tshe thung ste/ shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes
168b4: so/ / lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skyes par 'gyur te/ gang nas sha'i bos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo// de nas dang pa las shi'i bos pa dang sum bcu rtsa gsum
168b5: pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo // de nas sngon dad par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag zhag lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das la blta/
168b6: ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag ga chem yin gyis/ bdag cag zhag malon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon dang par gyur pa'i lha'i burna cha ga dub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs lus do shal dang sa
168b7: mo dos brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sgeg gal sogs pas byugs pa de dag gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pal dang pad ma dang ku mu dang pad ma
168b8: dkar po dang man dAr rnams kyis thub bkang ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me rtog gse gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas
169a1: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dang bar gyur ba'i lha bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su nung nas/ 'phags pa' ba ngadan pa bzhi rtogs par 'byung bar lta bu'ams bstan te/ rdza
169a2: nas sngon dang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ 'jag tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod pa
169a3: b tsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang rus pa'i la bskal ba dang ngan song ge sgo rnams bcad pa dang mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang bdag cag lha dang mi'i nang du bzhag pa
169a4: 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis mas kyang ma bgyis rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis/ kyang ma bgyis lags so/
169a5: / yang smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam// shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad// bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye// mya ngan 'das lam bdag cag rnams kyis thob// bdag cag de ring nyes
169a6: pa spangs pa'i mig/ shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob// bdag cag sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal// 'phags pa bgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob// mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nang spangs/
169a7: pa/ srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi// thub pa khyod ni der mthong 'bras bu yod// de nas do shal 'phyang rnams dga' gyur te// btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas// dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang // lha yi 'jig/
169a8: rten kha bltas lha yul song // de nas sngon dang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshong ba khe spogs phyin pa dang zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang nang pa nang thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor ba gang gis
169b1: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / / de'i tshe dge slong srong dang tho ras mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba
169b2: mthong ngo / / mthong bas kyang the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mngang sum mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin
169b3: nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin nam/ bajig rten
169b4: skyong ba bzhid la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no/ / dge slong dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis// dang pa lnga brgya 'dir btang pa khyod kyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa/ de dag nga la
169b5: sems dga' bar gyur te/ shi nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul gzang por skyes te/ de dag mdang sum da'i thad du lhags nas de dag la ngas chos bstan te bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su deng ngo // de nas
169b6: dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa sngon dang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las gang dag bgyis na des dang par skyes lags// las gang dag bgyis
169b7: na des lha'i nang du skyes te bden pa mthong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar
169b8: 'od pa'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ sngon dad par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams
170a1: ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po
170a2: dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ / lus can dag gi las rnams ni bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag
170a3: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skyes dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs
170a4: pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas
170a5: kyi nags na rten cing zhugs so/ / de'i tshe 'di dag rab tu byung ba las bslab pa la lhod par byas pa des ni dad par skyes so// nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so// bslab pa lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des
170a6: ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to/ / dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par bkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa
170a7: yang cig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren pa rnams spangs la/ las
170a8: gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtang bar bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das
170b1: kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa drug pa rdzogs s+ho// / sdom ni/ gser 'od dang ni dri zhim dang // byang bzang stobs ldan sna gra dang // pa
170b2: sa mig dang rnga sgra dang / / bu dang nyi ma kyang pa dang // // gsar 'od ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang po brang 'khor gyi me rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams
170b3: dang / ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas
170b4: mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang
170b5: zhal zas dang gzims cha dang / gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAH
170b6: phyug tsang nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chud ma blangs nas ded dang
170b7: lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ / de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las rlung mal bu chags nas de zla ba brgya dang ma dgu lon pa dang bu brung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes pa
170b8: me'i kha dog las ni 'das lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog 'dra ba zhig btsas te/ de'i gser gyi 'od kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas so// de nas pha ma dang sems can
171a1: gzhan dag gis de mthong nas ltad mo la lhags te sems can gyi khyad par 'di lta bu ni ga las 'ongs zhi gu zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems pa la zhugs so/ / de nas de bcas pa'i bcas ston byas nas
171a2: khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/ / nye du rnams na re 'di btsas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad gser gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming gser 'od ces gdags
171a3: so zhes zer ro/ / de nas khye'u gser 'od bang na 'tsho ba'i mam gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang drim 'bru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i mi ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la btad nas/ drimam brgyad kyis 'o ma dang
171a4: zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nyid khu dang / gzhan yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i ning gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de yang mkhas shing gsal la yid bzhungs pa dang dad pa dang
171a5: ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig go// byi se re shig na/ de byang gzugs kyi rgyags pas myos te grong khyer gyi phyi rol
171a6: na rtse zhing 'dug go/ shAkya mang po dag cig kyang shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar dod do// de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis mthong nas dris pa khyod gar 'dod/ de dag gis smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
171a7: blta ba'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar 'gro'o/ / de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba thos te/ sngon ma thos pa'i ming thos nas su thams cad zing zhes byas te/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas de
171a8: 'di snyam du sems te/ / mal ba dag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro gor ma chag snyam nas de yang shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
171b1: sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mngang
171b2: ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu byang gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
171b3: 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/ des chos de thos pa dang rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur to// de nas re shig na pha ma la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/
171b4: phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par
171b5: gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob du rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das
171b6: kyis phyag gser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas/ khye'u gser 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu tshur shog tshangs par spyod cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang
171b7: kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/ spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/ lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to// 'dir smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs
171b8: pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/ de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon// sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas// mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug
172a1: nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste/ des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas pol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed
172a2: kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom
172a3: pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgong
172a4: sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed
172a5: pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ / de nas dge slong dag the tshom sbas te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gser 'od kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di ltar gzugs bzang
172a6: zhing bltan sdug le mdzes pa dang rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gser 'od kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen
172a7: grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal gzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ gser 'od nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge
172a8: slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing
172b1: bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ / lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras
172b2: bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ / dge slong dag sngon byung po 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar
172b3: gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten
172b4: cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzod nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
172b5: su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod/
172b6: la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btong do// de nas re shig na khyim bdag gcig mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der song ba las mchod rten de las gser gyi
172b7: me long zhig lhung ba des mthong nas/ des de'i rna ba'i gong rgyan du bcos nas mchod rten de la brtags te/ spos dang bdug pa dang me tog gis mchod nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan ri
172b8: lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim
173a1: bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u gser 'od 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byis pa des na 'di lta bu byad gzugs kyi khyad par can du gyur to na
173a2: lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ / dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams na rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro// las gcig tu nges par dkar
173a3: rnams na rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren pa rnams spangs la las
173a4: gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
173a5: bstod do/ / // dri zhi ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang / gnod
173a6: s byin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam ma'a' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po
173a7: rnams kyim mtshan cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pan bza' dang zhal zas dang ga zims cha dang / gdan dang kun gsopa dang sman pong rnams parnyes panyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser rgya
173a8: gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa
173b1: des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig dri rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ / de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bza shing
173b2: blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btsas te/ de'i kha nas me tog ud pa la'i dri'i byung la/ lus thams cad las ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo // de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di
173b3: ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ de'i nye du rnams na re 'di'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri byung la/ lus thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri byung bas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dri zhim zhes gdags so// zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u dri zhim
173b4: bang na 'tshe ba'i mam gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad
173b5: kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par 'gyur to// de yang sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs kyi shugs kyis dad pa dang ldan la/ dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying
173b6: rje can bdag nyid che la chos 'dod pa zhig ste/ gang gi tshe khye'u 'di dri zhim zhing dpung rgyan dang mgul pa'i do shal dang gdu bus brgyan te srang gi nang du zhugs pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan gyi dri bsung gis grong khyer thams cad khyab par gyur te skye ba
173b7: mang pos kyang lha'i spos kyi dri tsher nas mchog tu ya mtshan du 'dzin te/ 'di skad du skye ma bsod nams dag gi mthu zhes zer ro// phyis re shig na khye'u dri zhim shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo // de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
173b8: sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu cu gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad pa nus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i rab 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzad pa
174a1: mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
174a2: kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas lca
174a3: dri zhim gyis 'jigs tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
174a4: pa la rab tu byung ngo / / des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas pol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi bstan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil pa dang ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor
174a5: pa dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser
174a6: dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa// tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag
174a7: par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes
174a8: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dri zhim gyis las gang dag bgyis na// des 'di'i kha nas ni ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/ lus thams cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyur
174b1: lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dri zhim nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing
174b2: bsags pas na/ dri zhim nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa ni dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi
174b3: 'gyur/ tshwa'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig lanam
174b4: par smin par 'gyur ro/ / lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal
174b5: dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa
174b6: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten dubyung ste/ de rgyal po'i'o pho brang gnyen ldanan tan cing bzhugs pa las re shig na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
174b7: rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zang ba'i ma bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis
174b8: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod
175a1: rten gyi dus ston yang lugs gtod do/ / khyim bdag gcig gis kyang de la dad pa bskyed nas/ spos dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs phul te/ 'dug pa dang me tog gis mchod nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i
175a2: rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtod pa 'dis na bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/
175a3: ces byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u dri zhim 'di yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
175a4: gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di lta bur dri zhim por gyur to/ / smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa
175a5: rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren
175a6: mar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab
175a7: par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgyapa pam
175a8: po bcwa lnga pa/ byad bzang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang po brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha
175b1: rnams dang / klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang /
175b2: gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ nam bza' dang zhal zas dang / gzims
175b3: chadang gdan dang snyun gsos drang sman zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sar skya'i gnas na shing rgyarbo'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na/ shAkya phyug cing nor mngal
175b4: longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de/ rigs mnyam pa las chu ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la
175b5: dga' mgur spyod do/ / de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i
175b6: kha dog ni ma thob pa/ lus byed dpe med la mdog 'jam pa/ lus kyi bdun mtho ba/ che bar grags pa zhing btsas so// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de
175b7: nye du rnams na re 'di'i lus dpe med pas na de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming byed bzang zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/ / de nas khye'u byad bzang bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma
175b8: gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang sho dang mar dang / zhun mar dang mar gyi nyid khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma
176a1: bzhin du skyengag par gyur to/ / da yang dang ba dang / ldan la dge babasam pa bzang ba/ bdag nga gnan la ban pa la zhugs pa snying rjecan bdag nyid kyi bcos 'drang bzhig tu/ 'jig rten thams cad dang thanams
176a2: yin pa rnams kyis kyang mchod cing brjod pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ / desas phyogs gang du gom pa bor ba de dag kyang gtsang mar gyur te/ de ltar bsod nams dang ldan zhing che bar grags so// phyis re shig na de shing rgya
176a3: gro d+hi'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang
176a4: gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' bskyed nas kyang bcom
176a5: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chung nas
176a6: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u byad bzang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras pa
176a7: mngon sum du bAs te/ des bden pa mthong nas pa ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bang bas phol rig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo ba
176a8: mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa
176b1: mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta zur
176b2: bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i drung pa dang chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi ga bdabang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i
176b3: rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa byung bzang gis las ga
176b4: dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i lus 'di lta bur gyur la dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag byad bzang nyid kyis/ sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang
176b5: ldan te/ dba' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na byang bzang nyid kyis las bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags
176b6: pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po
176b7: dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ / lus can dag gis las rnams ni bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon
176b8: byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
177a1: mgyu / zan padag/ da yinams kyiston pas rgyas sa dan das rnas pa gsan bya na d+hu// daHla pa ma zung na dza na gas
177a2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad sa nas/ shing zad pa'i sa bzhin daphung po'i gags med pa'i byang bu yos su rgya na las 'ad la de nas rgyal po gnyen sa kyi
177a3: ldan las kyi sku gdung la/ / skugadung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che zla ba ni las byas pa'i mchod rten lor por mug tu dpag cad gcigs yod pa/ 'bang du rgyang grags gcigasang bzhig cigs te/ de rgyal po gnyen mong gtan
177a4: tshogs dang bcas pa dang / blon po'i tshogs kyis zham ring byas pas mchod rten gyi dras ston byas so// byis re shig na nyi ma gcig cig/ mi dbul po zhig parjod rten gyi 'khong sa'i nang du song nas nges der me tog rnyis pa dag dang / mchod rten rdul
177a5: gyis log pa dag mthongango / / de nas des sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes sa dran nas dad pa skyes te/ phyogs mablangs nas mchod rten yang phyags/ me tog rnyings pa yang bsas to// de nas mchod rten la rdul med cing dri med pa mthong nas/
177a6: dga' ba skyes te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ smon lam btab pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa 'dis na bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed
177a7: pang ma kyar ci gcas byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar bral pa// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i ci de'i dras na med bral po dgur pa gang med pa deni/ byed bang 'di yin// des mdzod rten la phyag dang byas pas na kya gcag
177a8: bzang por gyur to/ / smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de lta ngan las gcig nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin par yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro//
177b1: las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams
177b2: dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtang bar bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te
177b3: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / // stobs ldan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang
177b4: tshang dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkung ste byas bla mar byas
177b5: mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod rnams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza'
177b6: dang zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas skya' gnas na shing n+ya kro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug
177b7: ci nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu ni dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chud mablangs nas/ nga dang nyan cig tu rtsen
177b8: dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ / de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chud ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgra lon pa dang babyung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ stobs kyi shugs gzhan
178a1: las 'phags pa zhig bcas so/ / de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i mang dzig gdags zhes mang 'dags par byed nga/ nye du rnams na khye'u 'di'i skabs kyi shugs dang ldan pas na/ dor phying byer
178a2: 'di'i ming stobs ldan zhes gdags so zhes zeng ngo / / de nas khye'u stobs ldan pang na 'tsha ba'i ma ma gnyis dang du mthun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i mam gnyis te ma ma brkyang la gtang nas/ dem ma
178a3: brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mang dang thun mar dang mar gyi nyid khu dang gzhan yang yo byed kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ de yangangad pa dang ldan la dag zheng bas ma pa ba zang
178a4: la/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig go// de nas phyis re shig na/ de shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes pa chen po'i mtshan
178a5: sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzad pa mthong nas/ mthong ma
178a6: thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do/ / 'ga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs pa phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ra
178a7: bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u stobs ldan gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes
178a8: rdo rjes bcos nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te des bden pa mthong nas/ pa ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang bslab pa dang 'bang bas pol mig lnga ba'i 'khor ba
178b1: 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi bstan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa
178b2: nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mala' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig
178b3: pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang gus
178b4: par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ / de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sang sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nus pa/ btsun pa stobs ldan gyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di'i lus stobs dang ldan par gyur la dgra bcom
178b5: pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag stobs ldan nyid kyis/ sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de
178b6: dag byas shing bsags pas na/ stobs ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi ral gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin pa
178b7: mi 'gyur chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par
178b8: 'gyur ro/ / lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu ban rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin
179a1: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rna mas
179a2: kyis ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs
179a3: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das
179a4: de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la 'phang du rgyad grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/ mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der skye bo
179a5: phal po ches glu blangs gar byas pas mchod rten dul gyis yog par gyur to/ / phyis re shig na khyim bdag cig mchod rten gyi 'khor ba'i nang du song ba dang / des mchod rten gyi 'khor ba rdal gyis yog pa mthong ngo // de nas khyim bdag
179a6: de sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas dad pa skyes te/ spos kyi 'do gu til mar dang sbyar ba phul nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu dag mnyes par byed par gyur cig
179a7: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni stobs ldan 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par
179a8: gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa des na stobs dang ldan par gyur to/ / smon lam btab pa/ des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig du nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par
179b1: smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro//
179b2: dge slong dag debs na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig du nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
179b3: kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // sdu gu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po
179b4: r nams dang phyug po rnams dang po brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci
179b5: rnams dang lto phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing
179b6: shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyan gsos dang sman zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas
179b7: na shing u0f7fzo 'i kun dga' ba na bzhugs sa/ / na'i tshe ser bya'i gnas na shAH phyug cing nor mang la longs spyong che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing bya che ba/ nam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ nam thos kyi bu'i ni
179b8: 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad
180a1: dam dag pan pa dang bru byung / / zhwa lagagags pazang dang bstan sngags 'angs ga/ rje ba grags pa mthod dpa bzhin man dam pa ba kyang byangs gnas thams ca grags pas rna
180a2: gyur to/ / de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming sdug zhes
180a3: gdags so zhes zer ro/ / de nas khye'u sdug pang na 'tsho ba'ams gnyis dang num snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dris 'khru ba'i sa ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma sa gnyis te mam brgyad lagatang nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyipa 'om dang zho dang sa dang
