180a4: zhun mar dang / sar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yod byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to// de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang /
180a5: gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ chos 'dod pa/ gtod pa la sred pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/ gtod pa chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/ des dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkrer
180a6: dang sdug cing phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bas sdud par byed do/ / de nas byas shig na khye'u su gu shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / ras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po mtshan
180a7: xxx/ xxx
180a8: mtshangs pag tu nas bcom ldan 'das pa sems dga' ba bskyed do/ / ga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gabs la phyag 'tshal te chos sanyan pa'i phyir bcos ldan das kyikun sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
180b1: nga'i bsas pa dang / khag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba dag bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u sbu gus 'dzag chags la lta ba'i ra'i rtse ma mthun pa tu
180b2: ye shes rdo rjes btsam nas blun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus don sum du byas te/ / des bden pa mthong nas pas la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo // des brtson pa dang bslab pa dang 'bad pas zol mig lnga
180b3: pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid gam zhing mi bstan par rig nas/ 'dra byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyim pa dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnas par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par cad ched de/ nod mo sa pa thams cad spang sa/
180b4: nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum dbyas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs
180b5: pa lta bar bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ sred pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang
180b6: bcas pa'i lha rnam pa kyis bachod cing brjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ / de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa
180b7: gras las gang dag bgyis na/ / ngas 'di grags pa chen po dang ldan pa dang mug cing yid la 'ad bar gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bcas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag pa
180b8: nyid cing tho da sa ga' dag tu tshigs ni cing ting thab pa dang thar ka/ dpa' rgal bzhin dbyung la/ gang da maza par 'a bar las dag/ byas shang babags pas/ pra thas byas las byas shing bsags par na
181a1: gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shong bsogs pa rnams na phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi
181a2: 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gis las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/
181a3: chags shing dus la bab pa na/ 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
181a4: dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
181a5: rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa
181a6: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdud la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug
181a7: tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyad grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs so// de nas phyis re shig na dpyid kyi dus su shing rnams me tog rgyas te me tog rnam pa sna tshogs byung ba na/ khyim bdag gcig gis rgyal po
181a8: la gsol pa/ bdag gi ni lha dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags par 'tshal lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas khyim bdag de dang rgyal po dang blon po dang zham
181b1: 'bring ba rnams kyis dril bsgrags te/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ste gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog btags te/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas sems dga' ba skyes nas/ dge ba'i
181b2: rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bskyed do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sdu gu 'di yin te/ des skye bo phal po che dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i
181b3: rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa des na/ skye bo phal po che'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyur gyur la/ rgyu de nyid kyis na blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig
181b4: canges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni
181b5: rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong
181b6: khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // pad ma'i mig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas
181b7: b com ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang po brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gno sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam
181b8: mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po
182a1: rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyis dge 'dun
182a2: dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'i ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan gnas/
182a3: thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtsa zhing dga' ba dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas
182a4: zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/ khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mig pad ma sngon po 'dra ba/ mgo bo la lha'i nor bu rin po che mthon ka thogs pa zhig btsas te/ des grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams
182a5: cad nor bu mthon ka'i kha dog can du byasaso/ / de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di mig pad ma dang 'dra bas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'dir
182a6: ming pad ma'i mig ces gdag so zhes zer ro/ / de nas khye'u pad ma'i mig ba ngan 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyid dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas
182a7: dem ma brgyad kyi sa 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ / de yang dad pa dang ldan la/
182a8: dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa gtod pa la sred pa sbyin pa la dga' ba rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba gtod pa chen po la gnas
182b1: zhig ste/ de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod cing brjed do/ de nas phyi zhig na khye'u pad ma'i mig shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
182b2: bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad banus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //
182b3: mthong ma zag tu nges bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do// dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan
182b4: 'das kyis de'i bsam pa bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thug su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u par ma'i mig gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i
182b5: mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas te des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge slong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par
182b6: byas nas pa ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ des brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi
182b7: rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang lhung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams
182b8: gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sngags bcom pa
183a1: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i
183a2: gan su gyur to/ / de nas re shig na de bsod snyoms la song ba dang / skye bo phal po ches de la bltas nas ngo mtshar bar gyur te/ de nas pad ma'i mig bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan
183a3: 'das kyis ci nas bdag ginor bu rin po chem mchis par mdzad du gsal/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa khu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na nor bu rin po che med par bya me nu'o// de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang /
183a4: ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad do// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
183a5: la nus pa/ btsun pa pad ma'i mig gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ pad ma'i mig nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs
183a6: gzhan dag du tshegs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/ gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ pad ma'i mig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig
183a7: gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par me 'byung
183a8: te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/
183b1: tshogs shar dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
183b2: dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste de
183b3: rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma
183b4: med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yus
183b5: du dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs de/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas re shig na/ ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho
183b6: chen po'i gru'i don grub ste/ phyir 'ongs nas des de'i nang nas nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po zhig khyer te 'ongs te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rje su dran te/ nor bu rin po ched
183b7: bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khab la btags nas de'i mthus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad mthon ka'i mdog lta bur 'dug par byaso/ / me tog pad ma dag gis kyang mchod pa byas na
183b8: smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cing / ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces bya so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
184a1: dag slong dag ji snyam du sam sada' tshad 'dus na dang dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pa ma'i tshig 'ang yin // des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mtshad rten la nar bu rin po che btags pa'i las de nas
184a2: bang sbyin pas 'anga'i mgo ba las nor bu rin po che byung po/ pad sa pon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa des nemag pangs ldan po lta bur gyur to/ sman lam btab pa ngas na tshe 'di la dam bcom pa nyid mngon dum bya'o/ sa nga
184a3: dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ las gcag tu nges par dkar ba rnams na rnam par smin pa yang gcig tungs par dkar bar 'gyur
184a4: las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ dge slong dag de bas na la sa gcig tungs par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu ngas par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhag la gtang bar/
184a5: bya ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / rnga sgra zhes bya ba
184a6: ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang po zang 'khor gyi me rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnad sbyin rnas
184a7: rang l+h+wa ma yin rnams dang rnamakha' lding rnams dang mi'am ci rnams dang sgo 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas tha mar bas ri so byas mchod pa byas te/ lce dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha'
184a8: d a mi'am ci dang lho 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nam pa tshan pa dang ldan ga na bza' dang zhal zapa dang gcoms cha dang gdan dang thun gas pa dang sra nganam
184b1: banas pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ ser skya'i gnas na shing na gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na gzug so// de'i tshe ser sna'i gnas na shAkya phyug cig nor mang la longs spyod cheg yong su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya cha garnam hA/
184b2: kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa das/ rigs mnyam pa las/ chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtsa zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las
184b3: chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing stan sdug la mdzes pa che bar grags pa/ bya ka la bing ka ltar skad snyan pa/ dza sIstA ra gdangs snyan pa zhig btsas so// de nas des/
184b4: pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming rnga sgra zhes gdag so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u
184b5: rnga sba ba na 'tshe ba'i ma ma gnyis dang ru ma snun pa'i sa ma gnyis dang drim 'khru ba'i mam gnyis dang rtse ba'i mam gnyis nyi mas brgyad la gtad nas/ dam ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang than sar dang mar gyi nyid
184b6: khwa dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang de cog gis bstod bsrings te 'tsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du ste drag par gyur to/ / de yang dad pa dang ldan la dag zhing bsam pa bzang pa bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs
184b7: pa snying rje can bdag nyid chab chos 'dod pa gtong ba la srad pa sbyin pa la dga' pa rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/ / de nas phyi zhig na khye'u rnga s+tha shing n+ya gra d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang
184b8: des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu sa mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od
185a1: mang ga na pakya' ba 'thob za can nas pazu ba mamang nas/ de mthag ng+yas bcom ldan das la sem sa dga' ba bskyed do// ga' ba bsnyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyin bayul phyag /
185a2: chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug god nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs chung dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa pan rtogs par 'gyur ba dal bu
185a3: chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas khye'ur spos 'jig tshogs la la ba'i re'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de nas bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang satu
185a4: sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge slong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing 'phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pa mal gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bade pas pol mi//
185a5: lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par cad chod do// nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs/
185a6: nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bor bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa
185a7: bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ reg pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i
185a8: lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to/ / de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rnga spras las gang dag bgyis na/
185b1: des 'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnga sgra nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/
185b2: dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na rnga sgra nyid kyi sa las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa
185b3: rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po
185b4: dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon
185b5: byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdus
185b6: bya'i kha lo sgyur ga / bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag nga
185b7: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyis phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan 'am la de dbying su yongasu mya ngan las 'das so/ nas rgyal pa gnyen/
185b8: yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la su gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyad grags gcig yod pa zhig bcigs te//
186a1: der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur sti byas nas mtho sa dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ de nas re sheg na khyim bdag cig gis rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang mi las rol mo bsrabs te/ mchod rten de 'bul
186a2: nas de dag mchod rten de la nyin gcig bzhin du rol mo'i sgo'i khyad par dag gis bkur ste byed do/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu b+hair pa gang yin pa de ni rnga s+tha 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'ad
186a3: rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rol mo'i cha byang rnam pa sna tshogs phul ba des na rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs can du gyur la/ chu de nyid kyis na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig
186a4: tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dgar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams
186a5: ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad bar bya ste/ dge slong
186a6: khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / sngag bu zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
186a7: l dan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lnga ma yin rnams
186a8: dang na mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lho
186b1: 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang sman gsos dang spar zong rnams bdes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'an
186b2: dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas ni shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya byug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam
186b3: thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung mal bu chags
186b4: nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon te bu btsas na sha snag bu chen po zhig byung ste/ pha ma dang khyim de nas gnas pa gzhan dag dang g.yog 'khor dang nye du rnams kyis de mthong nas 'di lta bu btsas pa ci yin zhes mi dga' bar
186b5: gyur to/ / de nas re shig na khyim bdag de mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs te/ lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khongasu chud cang 'dug ste 'di ci yin su la bsnyad par bya shes pa su yod snya mo de nas de'i blo skyes pa
186b6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin te/ des mkhyen gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyad par bya'o snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas
186b7: bcom ldan 'das la zhus so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/ sha snag bu de ras bal legs par rmel ba'i nang du chud la zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig
186b8: dus gsum du lag pas brims te/ 'o mas yang dang yang du gtor cig dang de'i 'og tu rdol te/ bu brgya 'byung bar 'gyur la de dag thams cad chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur to// de nas khyim bdag des de thos
187a1: nas mchog tu yas can sa tha te/ sams pa bdag ga bud lta bu dga'abyung bar 'gyur ban bdag gis rnyed pa lags par rnyed de snyam nas des de bzhin du byas pa dang / zhag bdun lan pa na sha sag bu rdol nas bubartswa byung /
187a2: ste/ thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go/ de nas re shig na mthar gyis bskyed bsrid nas cher skyes pa dang / de dag
187a3: thams cad byad gzugs dang lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs te/ phan tshun 'khyam pa las shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis le/
187a4: par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gangags brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu de dag kyi
187a5: bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed do/ / dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag
187a6: gi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thug su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'khrur bapa de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/ de thos nas thams cad kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon
187a7: po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de nas thams cad kyis brtson pa
187a8: dang bsgrub pa dang / 'bad bas thol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyim pa dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can
187b1: yin par chad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ namakha' dang lags /
187b2: duru 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ reg pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti
187b3: la me lha ga dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i/ / lharnams kyis mchod cing brjod pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
187b4: la zhus pa/ btsun pa gzho nu brgya po 'di dag gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des spun du gyur la chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di rnams kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan
187b5: dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis
187b6: nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/
187b7: las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshogs
187b8: shing dras la bab pa na/ / 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcag pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
188a1: pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde ba gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i lalo byung ba/ blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ kyil
188a2: pa'i po zangagarten ldanan rten cing bzugs pa las/ gishin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa gcigs/ sang sa rgyas kyi drin las thams cad mnanas/ shing zad pa'i ma bzhin phung pa'i zhag sa med pa'i byang na las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su
188a3: myangan las 'ang so/ / de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sug du la sdug du gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna ba ne las byas pa'i mchod rten long lor yug tu dpag chad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyang grags gcis yod bzhig brtsigs te/ der srog chags//
188a4: 'bum zag dums bkur ste byas nas mtho ngas dang thang par 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas de shig na mdza' ste bo bcu phyi sa du byung ba dang de gagis mchod rten de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon zharje su dranate/ de dag gis spyan cigadu til mang spos can gyi sathugs nas
188a5: me to/ dang me tog phre dang mar me dbul ba dag gis kyang bsnyen bkur byas nas lhan cig tu smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag gang da gang du skyes pa de dang deng spun du gyur te/ lhan cig tu lkog ci/ khon nas 'byung bar gyur ci// tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob pa dang byang
188a6: gzugs dang ldan par gyur cig/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur ci// mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na mdzad
188a7: bo gyung pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshan po che 'di dag yin te/ de dgags lhan cig tu mchod rten de la bkur sti byas pa des na 'di ltar lhan cig tu skyes te/ tshan po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob par gyur to// blon lam
188a8: btab bdas na gcig tu mthun pa rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur ro/ / dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gan/
188b1: bar 'gyur ro/ las gcig du nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ dge slong dag debs na las gcig du nges par
188b2: gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge
188b3: slong de dag yi da rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / // gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjed pa brgya pa// bam po bcu drug pa// nyi ma zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
188b4: r gyal po rnams dang blon pa chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang po brang ba khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang na mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am
188b5: ci rnams dang lho 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes
188b6: ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang ga dan dang snyun gsos dang sman zod rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ yul ser skya'
188b7: gnas na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so/ / de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod cheg/ yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang
188b8: 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// dartsa zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung mal bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgra
189a1: lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes pa nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs pazhig btsas nas/ de las khor khor yug tu nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu 'phro ste// de'i sngar bas mtshan mo grong khyer sar
189a2: skya'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyur pas nyin mo bzhin du snang bar byaso/ / de nas pha ma dang khyim de na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams dang nye ru rnams dang sar skya'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis de mthong nas/ ya
189a3: mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyas so/ / de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes med 'dogs par byed de/ nye ru rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad
189a4: nyi ma bzhin du snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming nyi ma zhes gdag so zhes zer ro// de nas khye'u nyi ma ba dan 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/
189a5: ma ma brgya dal gtad nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nyid khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin tu skye drag par gyur to// de yang
189a6: dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa dang zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa skye dgu la byams pa gtod pa la sred pa sbyin pa la dga' ba rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par
189a7: dga' ba gtod pa chen po la gnas pa zhig go/ / de nas byis re shig na/ khye'u nyi ma shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ngan song ba dang / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi legs
189a8: par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/ mthong ma thag tu
189b1: des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar bskyed do/ dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'o//
189b2: bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thug su chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u nyi mas 'dzag tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu me
189b3: shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing pho ngas pa rnams chis par byas nas pa
189b4: ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad bas po la mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams
189b5: cad rnyil ba dang / ltung pa dang rnam par mthong ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad tshod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i
189b6: 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bor bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang
189b7: mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas
189b8: su gyur to/ / de nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa nyi ma bsod snyoms la 'gro ba de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'phya zhing rmod la rkog 'phyas byed de/ de 'di ltar nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs nas/ lam po che
190a1: dang srad dang gan med dang sum mdo dag tu 'khyam pa las na/ shAkya bu dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gatshul na tshig pa'o// bra mtha' rdul na chag pa'o zhes 'dzer // de napa da shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan/
190a2: 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'dra
190a3: kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas na med par byar mi nuso// de lta mod kyi ci nas dang pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis mthong la/ ma dad pa rnams kyis mi mthong bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdza/
190a4: de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nyi mas las gang dag bgyis na/ des 'di che bar grags pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/ bcom
190a5: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyi ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ nyi ma nyid kyi sa las byas shing bas tha
190a6: pade dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par
190a7: smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams ni// bskal pa
190a8: brgyar yang chud mi za/ / tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
190b1: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo skur ba/ bla na med pa la dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba
190b2: 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung por
190b3: lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das so/ de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdud la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor lo
190b4: yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la'abang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa nig brtsigs te dang srog cags 'bus drag dums bkur sti byas nas mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas mchod rten de'i mchod pa la bab pa na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dang /
190b5: ldan pa rnams kyis spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod pa byed do// de nas re shig na mi zhig rgyal po dang rgyal po rtses nas skugasu nor
190b6: bu rin po che me shel zhig thob bo/ / de nas de dad pa skyed nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyis mchod rten gyi char khab la btags te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa
190b7: dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis ni bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/ nor bu rin po che 'di lta bu
190b8: yang spyi bo la thogs bzhin du ma'i lto nas 'byung bar 'gyur cig ces byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshe lo la dor sna byed pa gang yin pa de ni nyi ma 'di nyid yin te/
191a1: des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur sti byas pa dang / nor bu rin po che btags pa des ni de'i mgo po las nor bu rin po cha thung la rnyeng nyid kyis gzugs bzang zhing stan sdug la mdzes par gyur/
191a2: te/ gra bcom pa nyid mngon sam du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyura'o// las gcig tu nges par dkar baM rnams ni rnam par
191a3: smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur go las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las
191a4: gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtang bar bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis
191a5: gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / gyad kyi ba dan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded
191a6: dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam mkha' lding rnams dang mi'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/
191a7: na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzin/
191a8: ra rang gdan dang sun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de'i tshe sar skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mngal u0f7f
191b1: spyo che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che la rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ / rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas ba des rigs mnyam pa las chung mablangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgung spyod do//
191b2: dertse zhing dga' la dga' mthur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/ de thab brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bstun sdug la mdzes pa mo'i kha dog las ni 'das lha'i 'don ni mtho
191b3: te/ gang gi tshe khye 'u bcas pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyis khor khor yug nas sti'i bdan dag bsgreng ngo // lha'i rol mo'i mabyung dag mang bdu go m+b+ha'i me to// ud pa la dang pad ma dang bu mud dang pad mad/ dab rnams kyis ca // ser mya gan
191b4: kyi grong khyer thams cad du grags pas rgyas par gyur to/ / khyim thams cad du yang de'i phyir ba dan bsgreng ngo // de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dog par byed de/ nye du rnams
191b5: na re khye'u 'di btsas pa na 'jig rten thams cad du grags pa na/ de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan grags zhes gang gso zhes ze'o// de nas khye'u stan grags pad na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang num snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang
191b6: dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtang nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar gyi nyid khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par babang ngo cog gis bsgreng bsrings te
191b7: mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur te/ de yang dang ba dang ldan la dge zhing pasam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig ge de nas phyisar
191b8: shig na khye'u snyan grags shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / nges sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus
192a1: mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'ad mnga' ga ran pa cha' ri po 'gro ba lta ba kun nas bzang ba mthad nas mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bskyed
192a2: ro/ / dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhe
192a3: thugs su chung nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas khye'u snyan grags kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon lo nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
192a4: 'bras bu thob ste des bden pa mthong nas/ sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bkren pa dang sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas pha ma la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung
192a5: des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i
192a6: chos can yin par rtsed chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa nam ma'
192a7: dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa reg pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa rnyed pa dang chags sa
192a8: dang bkur stil me lta pa/ dbang po dang nyed pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// de yang gsol pa btab ste phul ba'i gos spyod de/ gsol pa btab ste bral ba ma yin pa ni nyung
192b1: duspyod do/ / gsol ba btab ste phul ba'i zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zod skyed de/ gsol ba btab ste phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom
192b2: ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa snyan grags kyis las gang dag bgyis na/ des btsas ma thag tu lha rnams kyis ba dan bsgred nas/ 'jig rten du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/ rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/
192b3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag snyan grags nyid kyis sdeni tsha rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin tu byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas
192b4: na/ snyan grags nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams
192b5: dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams na/ zin pa'i phung po dang khanas dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// lus can dag gi las rnams
192b6: bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par
192b7: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs ldan pa/ bdabar gshegs pa/ 'dzag rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha le sbyor ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi snyan pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzugs zhes bya ba
192b8: 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re sheg na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du
193a1: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs sa myang rnams 'dasaso/ / ma rgyal dogatan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i grag dung la sra gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa
193a2: mchod rten khor khorang yug dung pag tshad gcig yod la/ 'bang du rgyad grags gcig yong bzhig brgyags te/ dang srog chags 'bum phrag dums bzang ste byas nas mthong sa dang thar bar 'gro bar 'arung / nas shigan
193a3: rgyal po gnyen yod kyis mchod tan de la dus ston byas nas/ mchod rten gyi dus ston byeng ba der kyang 'byed pa rnams kyi ba dan dag bsgred // de nas re shig na rgyal po'i byad gcig gis kyad gcig non pa dang / des kyad kyi ba danathog
193a4: nas des de blangs te srog chags 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs len cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gal ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon
193a5: tan dran par byas te/ ba dan de mchod rten gyi steng gi srog shing la btags nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ ston pa 'di lta bu bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes
193a6: bar byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gyang du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sman grags 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byas pa des
193a7: na 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur la/ rgya de nyid kyis nga ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de ltar na las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par banag par
193a8: khung / / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'byung // las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'thung / dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu ngas par gnags
193b1: rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtang bar bya ste/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong de dag pa//
193b2: rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs par brjod pa brgya ba las// rtogs brjod pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ste// sdom gyi tshigasu bcad pa bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// sdo ma ni'o//
193b3: bzang ma dang rab sdugs// dkar mo zla ba ud pa la// mdzes ldan ma dang mu tig dang // ka tshad ga la bde byed ma// ma sdug sde chen bcad de bstan// 'od bzang ma zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /
193b4: blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang po brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang na mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am
193b5: tsa rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes /
193b6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyu na gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ mnyan du yod pa na rgyal
193b7: burgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas spyan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs/ / de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ tshang dpon phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba yongs 'dzin pa/ yangs shang rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu no
193b8: dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhog gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chud/
194a1: mal bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgra lon pa dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa lha'i rgyan gyis klubs pa nor bu rin po che mgul na thogs pa zhig btsas te/ de las 'od byung ba des mnyan
194a2: ra yod pa thams cad snad par bya'o/ / de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dags par byed de/ nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di bcas ma thag tu nor bu rin pa chen po'i 'od kyis mnyan
194a3: ru yod pa thams cad snang bar byas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes gdag so zhes zer ro// de nas bu mo 'ong bzang ma ba dan 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma
194a4: gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtang nas/ de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nyid khung dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzad do cog gis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nad
194a5: gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur te/ bu mo de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/ bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa zhig ste/ de la slong ba su dang su 'das kyang rung ba de dang de dag la mgulas
194a6: brgyan bkrol te/ sbyin par byed do// byin nas kyang yang rgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu rnams dang blon po'i bu rnams dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo dag de slong du 'ong
194a7: ro/ / de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/ de'i pha lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te ra sam pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyuraro snyam nas/ sems khong su chud cing 'dug go// de nas re shig na
194a8: bu mo des pa sems khor su chud pa mthong nas/ smras pa/ yab ci zhig gis sems khongasu chud cing bzhugs/ de nas de'i don rgyas par bsnyed do// de nas bu mo de na re yab thugs dan ma mdzad cig dang / nga ste zhag bdun na
194b1: bdag nyid kyis khyim thang ba dam par 'tshal zhes zer ro/ / de nas tshad dpon des rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol nas mnyan du yod par dril bsgrags te/ da ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'od bzang mngang nyid khyim thab 'dam
194b2: bar chad kyis khyed kyis bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces byas so/ / de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang bu mo 'od bzang ma shing rta la zhon te chos gos tshon can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgred nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
194b3: sku gzugs ri mor bris te bstod pa 'don cing srad du zhug so/ / de nas der rgyal po la bu rnams dang blon po'i bu rnams dang tshong dpon gyi bu rnams de la yid smon byed cing lta ba de dag la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shad kyis byang bar
194b4: bshad de/ bdag gis khyed la gang gi sgo nas kyang skya brnyas ni mi 'tshal na yod ye bdag 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags pa kho nar bso// bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabasu song ste/ de'i thad du rab tu 'byungango zhes byas nas
194b5: de dag phyir log go/ bu mo 'od bzang ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'du go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam/
194b6: ba dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs chud nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/ de thos nas bu mo 'od bzang mas 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i phyir ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu
194b7: ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ des banan pa mthong nas mngon par shes pa yang bsgrub so// de nas bu mi 'od bzang ma stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i/
194b8: lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log sa thal ma gyur ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bstan par
195a1: rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po thob du rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal la/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di la gdul bar bya ba mang po dag des 'dren par 'gyur
195a2: bar thug su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo song la 'khor rnams kyang ltos shig/ de nas bu mo 'ong bzang ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas byung ste mang ba 'dus pa'i nang du song ba dang / der so so nas bsams pa/
195a3: 'di mthus dbrog par bya'o snyam te/ de dag gis de gzung bar byaso// de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma de dag gis brtags pa dang / dang ba'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang pa bzhin du na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshos/
195a4: bstan to// so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur nga dad par byed de de nas de dag gis lha dang mi rnams dang bar byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong ngo mthong nas kyang spu zing zhes byas nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag
195a5: 'tshal nas gsol ba btab pa/ sru mar skyon mar spyon khyed kyis chas 'di lta bu dag mngon sum du byas pa las na/ khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do zhes byas so// de nas bu mo 'ong bzang ma na mkha' las babs nas skye bo
195a6: phal po che'i gud la 'dug ste/ gang thos pas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad de des deb tu phyung ste bsnyen par
195a7: rdzogs par bya so/ / de nas des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bang bas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad brnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang /
195a8: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad tshod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar
195b1: mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa
195b2: dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas
195b3: bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa 'od bzang gis las gang dag bgyis na/ des gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / mgul ba nas kyang nor bu rin po che byung la rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum
195b4: du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'od bzang ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag dag tu tshegs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag
195b5: byas shing bsags pas na/ 'od bzang ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi
195b6: 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur
195b7: ro/ / lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za// tshegs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
195b8: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs
196a1: zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldanan rten cing bzhugs pa las/ re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i mabazhin
196a2: du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i skrag dung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bani las byas pa
196a3: rten khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du rgyad grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsegs sa/ de nas re shig na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam pa rgas nas rgyan rnam pas
196a4: tshogs lus las krol te mchod rten del phulalo/ / de nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems skyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yong su gtong ba 'dis na bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur cig ce
196a5: byas/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'od bzang ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod
196a6: rten la rgyan sna tshogs btags pa des na gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes pa dang / yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bya'o// dge slong
196a7: dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro/ 5
196a8: 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad
196b1: ra bya ste/ dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / rab sdug ma zhes bya ba /
196b2: ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang ded dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha
196b3: ma yin rnams dang na mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas bla mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yon dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang
196b4: lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
196b5: dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so/ / de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi chung mal bu chags nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang /
196b6: bu byung ste bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi snying du rab tu sdug pa zhig bcaso// de nas de btsas pa'i btsas
196b7: ston byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye ru rnams na re bu mo 'di skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming rab sdug ma zhes gdag so zhes zer mo/ de yang tshe rabs dran
196b8: te/ btsas ma thag tu tshigasu bcad pas smras pa/ sbyin pa byin pa mang nyung ci yang rung // zhing gi khyad par gzhi las 'phel bar 'gyur// de'i phyir mkhas pas bsgrims te 'jig rten du// dad pas lha mi dbang phyug sangs rgyas sbyin//
197a1: tu rings par rab sdug ma'i mdun du song ste smras pa/ rab sdug ma gang 'gro/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du zhal ta ba'i las byed par bsko so// mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyi de dag thams
197a2: cad bdag gis sbyar gyis khyod kyis bya mi dgo so/ / rab sdug mas smras pa/ gal te yab bden pa mthong ba lags la sa'i 'og thog dag tu sbas pa'i gter rnams kyang mngon du gzigs na/ sbyar ba 'di la ngo mtshar che ba ci mchis/ 'on
197a3: kyang bdag ni skye bo dbul po la phan gdags pa'i slad du zhal ta bgyid do/ / de bzhin du dge bsnyen lnga brgya dang / btsun mo phreng rgyud ma dang rgyal rigs kyi bu mo dbyar tshul ma dad btsun mo 'khor gyi bla drang srong sbyin dang gna' mi dang ra
197a4: dgas 'dzin gyi mas ga dang rgyal po gsal rgyal rnams kyis kyang skabs phye ste/ khyod kyis bya mi dgo so zhes byaso// de nas nags khung du song nas der mi ma yin pa mi'i cha lugs can dag gis kyang skabs phye'o// de ltar skabs
197a5: nas kyang / des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zod rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byaso// des zla ba gtum
197a6: po de nyid kyi skabasu brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam
197a7: par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de nyon mo ngas pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang por ma
197a8: gan mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsal bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo de'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid
197b1: de nas de'i pha ma dang gzhan yang khyim de na gnas pa rnams kyis tshig brjod pa zos nas skrag cing spangs te mi dga' bar gyur la/ spyi bung zhes byas nas smras pa kye mabu mo 'di ni sha za mo zhig go// des smras pa/ yum pa/
197b2: nishaza mo yang ma lags/ srin mo yang ma lags kyi/ bdag ni bu mo lags te spyan pa dag sbyin par 'tsha'o// de nas de'i mas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la bu mo de 'di skad mchi'o zhes pa do// de nas khyim bdag de dga' ning /
197b3: mgul rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos gsol te/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i rabs 'don du bcugo/ de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis lo bdun lon pa de'i tshe pha ma la
197b4: gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ de dge slong ma thams cad la sdug pa dang phangs pa dang snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'ong bar gyur to// re shig na de'i tshe mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra ba'i mu ge
197b5: chen po byung nas/ der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma bza' ba dang btung ba med pas shi'o// de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la rab sdug ma la de na re 'khor bzhi/
197b6: po rnams la khyod kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams phul cig ces gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rab sdug ma'i thad du song nas smras pa/ bcom
197b7: ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod kyis 'khor bzhi po rnams zla ba gsum gyi bar du gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams phul cig ces bka' stsal to/ / de nas rab stug mas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom
197b8: ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos mnos nas bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smraso/ / de nas rab sdug ma spyod yul gyi grong blta ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par cha so// de nas re shig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gtam de thos nas shin/
198a1: ba'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti ra mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gan su gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba gsum 'das pa dang / chos sgo/
198a2: mdzad de chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te lhung zad bsdams nas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu chas te gsheg so// de nas rab sdug mas bcom ldan 'das dang /
198a3: lam du phrad nas 'o rgyal mi 'tshal zhes gsol to// de nas re shig na nags khung chu dang ldan pa zhig tu phyin nas drol bab na brgyags kyang med nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs par
198a4: gsol to/ / de nas lhung bzed lag pa g.yon pa la bzhag ste/ tshig tu smras pa/ gal te bsod nams dag gi rnam par smin ma yod ce na/ bdag gi lhung bzed bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang bar
198a5: gyur cig ces byaso/ / de nas lhas lha'i bdud rtsis bkang ngo // de nas rab sdug gis gral rims bzhin du dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzeng rnams zhal zas kyis bkang nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
198a6: rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma bsod nams byas pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste dge slong ma rab sdug ma yin no/ de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa
198a7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rab sdug mas las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i rig su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyis bkur la rab tu byung nas
198a8: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rab sdug ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la
198b1: gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ rab sdug ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan du zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi ba'i
198b2: khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams
198b3: 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ / lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ bskal pa brgyar yang chung mi za// tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal ba
198b4: bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
198b5: kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhug ste/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dro
198b6: sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/ mdun du gdar nas bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang / re shig na tsheng dpon zhig g.yog 'khor dang
198b7: bcas te bskyed mos tshal du song nas bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag kyang khyer ro/ / de nas re shig na de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo zhig 'bras chen gyi gze ba khyer te jo bo'i phyi bzhin du 'gro ba las bu mo mngag zhug
198b8: ma des/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lam khar mthong nas de dga' bar gyur te blo skyes pa/ bdag la jo bos lan gnyi su bran mor byar ci yod gyis bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol gong ma chag
199a1: snya mo/ / de nas des bsad pa dang bcing ba dang brdeg pa dang brngas nas 'bras chen gyi gzeb phye ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhal zas sna tshogs kyis tshim par bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi thag tu/
199a2: song ba dang / shig na tshang dpon gyis bu mo 'bras chen gyi gzeb dag re zhes dris// des spras pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la zhal zas bu'o zhes byas pa dang / tshod dpon
199a3: kyis de thos nas mchog tu yamatshan du gyur / / de nas de dga' ning mgul rab tu dga' nas smras pa bu ma byed deng byin ched bran ma las phyung gis song shig// khyod kyis bdag ga nyid kyis log pa namal tshe byas pa yin zhes smras/
199a4: de nas des thal mo sbyar te khyim bdag la gsol ba/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes byaso// de nas khyim bdag des lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang byin nas/ de jo bos byin pa'i lhung bzed
199a5: dang chos gos khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab la lo dgu stong gi bar du zhal ta pa'i las byas te/ 'bras chen dang skyo ma dang thug pa btung ba dang rtag nges 'a'o
199a6: dang 'gron du bod pa dang mar me'i phreng ba dang chos gos sra brkyang rnams dang / sbyin pa dang rab tu sbyin pa rnams kyang phul ste/ smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis dka' bas bsgrubs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sbyin pa dang rab
199a7: sbyin pa dag phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab la rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig ces bya'o// bcom ldan du
199a8: kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo mdag gzhug mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab sdug ma 'di yin te/ des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la zhal zas phul ba des na phyug po'i
199b1: su skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang skye bo thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur to// smon lam btab pa des ni de ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par
199b2: gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig du nges par gnas par gyuraro/ / las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuro// las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par
199b3: smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang / las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/ las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/ dge slong khyod/
199b4: kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dkar mo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan dra
199b5: l a rgyal po rnams dang blon po chen po rnams dang phyug pa rnams dang po brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang tshong dpon rnams dang dad dpon rnams dang lha rnams dang klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang nam
199b6: mkha' lding rnams dang mi 'am ci rnams dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur sti byas tha mar byas ri mo byas mchod pa byas te/ lha dang khru dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang namakha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lho'i bya
199b7: chen po rnams kyis mchod rdzing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang spyan gsas dang sran zong rnams brnyes pa/ nyan thos
199b8: kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser rgya'i gnas na shing n+ya kro d+ha'i kun dga' ban patshun pa/ de'i chos kya rnams kyi nang nas kya sngar ma zhes bya ba drug cing nor mang la las spyod tshig yong su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya
200a1: ba rnam thos kyi bu'i mir dang ldan pa/ rnam thom gyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod
200a2: kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med de lag pa la sgo mtshugs bcas nas bsams pa bdag gis khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang / bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni ba med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa
200a3: thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyu ro snyam ste sems khongasu chud cing 'dugo/ / de nas dge sbyong dang bram ze dang ltas mkhan dang / mnga' bo dang gnyen dang rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig cis de la bsgo'o// de
200a4: nas de bu med de bu 'dod pas gu lang dang chu lha dang ku be ra dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/ 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang nags tshal gyi lha dang lam
200a5: gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang sum mdo'i lha dang gtor ma len pa'i lha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang chos mthun pa dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'deb so/ / 'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu
200a6: dang bu mo skye bar 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i gtam yod mod kyi de yang de lta ni ma yin te/ gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du pin na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod/
200a7: bar 'gyur ba'i rig so// ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na pha ma ni 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dri za 'ongs pa ste gnas 'di
200a8: gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/ sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 'phos te de'i chud ma'i ltor zhugs nas des khyim
200b1: thab la sbran to/ / de nas khyim thab kyis smras pa/ bzang mo gal te bu khye'u zhig btsas na na legs/ de ma yin te bu mo zhig btsas na ni de nyid dang bcas te khyod khyim nas bskrang de gtang ngo // de nas re shig na zla ba brgyad dam dgu yon pa
200b2: dang bu byung ste/ bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/ lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa gos dkar mo gyon pa mngal gyi dri mas ma gos pa zhig btsas so// de nas re shig na shAkya snar mas khyod
200b3: kyi chung ma la chu byung ste bu mo zhig bcaso zhes thos pa dang de khros te nang du sa do/ / de nas de'i chung mas lha'i gos gyon pa'i bu mo phu'o// de nas shAkya sA rams bu mo mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan tu gyur to// btsas pa'i bcas
200b4: ston byas nas bu mo 'ji'i ming ji skad gang gis zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/ nye du rnams na re 'di gos dkar mo gyon bzhin du bcas pas na/ de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming dkar mor gang gso zhes zer ro/ de nas bu mo dkar mo
200b5: bdan 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtang nas de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nyid khu dang
200b6: gzhan yang yo byad kyi ltud par bzang de cig gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du sgra drug par 'gyur to// bu mo dkar ma ji tsam du skye bde tsal du gos de dag kyang skye ste dim can du yang mi 'gyur la rdo
200b7: las la yang dri mas gos par mi 'gyuro/ / de nas gang gi tshe bu mo dkar mo mthar gyis chen mar gyur pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i bu rnams dang tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo // de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas de'i
200b8: ba lag pa la rko btsugs bcas te bsams pa/ gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyu ro snyam nas sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/ de nas re shig na bu mo nges pa sems khongasu chud cing 'dzag pa mthong na
201a1: rnamams can nanas thams 'angs chung cing bzugs/ den sa don rgyas par bdang / nas bra ma nar ya ba thugs ngan ma mdzad cag / bdag na 'dad pa la dan duganyang ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa
201a2: rba thung gis/ ya gyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad drugasapa/ de nas sheg de ba ma gnyis la gas la nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ gas gang dag gyen da bsas pa de dag nyid ces shes
201a3: shu ka/ sangs brjon pa dang snang ba dang 'badabs pal mig sngala'i 'khar pa'i 'khang po 'ang nyid gas ning mi brtan par riganas/ 'dra byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnam pa dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang
201a4: par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gseng dang bong bar mnyam gan mkha'
201a5: dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgo de'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i snyed pa dang chags pa
201a6: dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing brjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gan su gyur to// de nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
201a7: 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dkar mos las gang dag bgyis na des phyug po'i rigs skyes te/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang gos dkar po gyon pa dang rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags
201a8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / dge slong dkar mo nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rgyan grub pa dang ldan te/ dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/
201b1: dkar mo nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams na phya rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par sman par ma 'gyur/ chutshwa'i khams dang ma'i khams dang rlung gi/
201b2: khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge pa dang me dag pa byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung ba dang khams dang skye mched rnams 'apa' shigs rnam par smin par 'bru ga / lus can dag gas las rnams nas
201b3: ba brgyar yang chud mi za/ / tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang ba 'di nyid la/ skye dgra'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
201b4: rig pa dang zhabs ldan pa/ bang bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sku ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
201b5: degrong khyer bA rA Na sIn drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhug so// de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi chung ma dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang zhing 'dug pa drang srong smra bar don zhig la song ngo // de nas des
